line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">DWINDLING BEE\nPOPULATION DUE TO HFCS FEED</span>, <span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;MORBID OBESITY AND ALZHIEMERS DUE TO GM CORN\nDERIVED HFCS IN SOFT DRINKS</span></b></span>&nbsp; - CAPT AJIT\nVADAKAYIL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The sweetening agent\nused in soft drinks like Coke, Pepsi, Mountain Dew etc is high fructose GM corn\nsyrup&nbsp; .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5IJtQ8MebMc/Uxgz1YC0fAI/AAAAAAAAp38/ugBKGLPV5k4/s1600/downlmkljnhuioad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5IJtQ8MebMc/Uxgz1YC0fAI/AAAAAAAAp38/ugBKGLPV5k4/s1600/downlmkljnhuioad.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your body metabolizes\nfructose in a much different way than glucose. The entire burden of\nmetabolizing fructose falls on your liver. &nbsp;This causes a fatty liver .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Almost all corn syrup\nis made from genetically modified corn, which comes with its own set of risks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-CV-_MbvdkSc/Uxgz-ZmuqVI/AAAAAAAAp4E/Vkpko4vPlvE/s1600/dowgj6tnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-CV-_MbvdkSc/Uxgz-ZmuqVI/AAAAAAAAp4E/Vkpko4vPlvE/s1600/dowgj6tnload.jpg\" height=\"234\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As part of the chemical\nprocess used to make high fructose corn syrup, the glucose and fructose --\nwhich are naturally bound together -- become separated. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-X6dSkxpI8DA/Uxg0Eovo_NI/AAAAAAAAp4M/X9t9OHsIX5c/s1600/downegersbsload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-X6dSkxpI8DA/Uxg0Eovo_NI/AAAAAAAAp4M/X9t9OHsIX5c/s1600/downegersbsload.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This allows the fructose to mainline directly\ninto your liver, which turns on a factory of fat production in your liver\ncalled lipogenesis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ylk3kx2zbYI/Uxg0LpqW3cI/AAAAAAAAp4U/zpP2Ts0ojHw/s1600/imagedsvavs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ylk3kx2zbYI/Uxg0LpqW3cI/AAAAAAAAp4U/zpP2Ts0ojHw/s1600/imagedsvavs.jpg\" height=\"240\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This leads to fatty\nliver, the most common disease in the world today. &nbsp;High fructose corn syrup is the real driver of\nthe current epidemic of heart attacks, strokes, cancer, dementia, Alzheimer\u2019s and\ntype 2 diabetes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-U91zv9gQHnI/Uxg0Q6KZ8tI/AAAAAAAAp4c/T3H0acj66Hc/s1600/imadh5rdges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-U91zv9gQHnI/Uxg0Q6KZ8tI/AAAAAAAAp4c/T3H0acj66Hc/s1600/imadh5rdges.jpg\" height=\"240\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More than 500 vital\nfunctions have been identified with the liver.&nbsp;\nSome of the more well-known functions include the following:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Production\nof bile, which helps carry away waste and break down fats in the small\nintestine during digestion<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Production\nof certain proteins for blood plasma<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Production\nof cholesterol and special proteins to help carry fats through the body<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conversion\nof excess glucose into glycogen for storage (glycogen can later be converted\nback to glucose for energy)<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Regulation\nof blood levels of amino acids, which form the building blocks of proteins<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Processing\nof hemoglobin for use of its iron content (the liver stores iron)<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conversion\nof poisonous ammonia to urea (urea is an end product of protein metabolism and\nis excreted in the urine)<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Clearing\nthe blood of drugs and other poisonous substances<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Regulating\nblood clotting<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Resisting\ninfections by producing immune factors and removing bacteria from the\nbloodstream.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<i><a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rUw3zXOKq6Y/Uxg0ZcbgjgI/AAAAAAAAp4k/RXmYBloBF4s/s1600/imHJFUages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rUw3zXOKq6Y/Uxg0ZcbgjgI/AAAAAAAAp4k/RXmYBloBF4s/s1600/imHJFUages.jpg\" height=\"133\" width=\"320\" /></a></i></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Kerala we use liver\nas a term of endearment. &nbsp;If you tell a pretty\ngirl, you are a piece of mE liver, she will blush like mad and get thrilled to her\nTEEs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-AQzYgFzlLB4/Uxg0hEaJv0I/AAAAAAAAp4s/EmNVPDepS70/s1600/imajkhvgfyiges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Getting back-</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Regular cane sugar\n(sucrose) is made of two-sugar molecules bound tightly together\u2013 glucose and\nfructose in equal amounts.&nbsp; The enzymes\nin your digestive tract must break down the sucrose into glucose and fructose,\nwhich are then absorbed into the body. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HFCS also consists of\nglucose and fructose, not in a 50-50 ratio, but a 55-45 fructose to glucose\nratio in an unbound form. &nbsp;Fructose is\nsweeter than glucose. &nbsp;And HFCS is\ncheaper than sugar because of the government farm bill GM corn subsidies. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Products with HFCS are\nsweeter and cheaper than products made with cane sugar. This allowed for the\naverage soda size to balloon to higher volumes &nbsp;with little financial costs to manufacturers\nbut great human costs of increased obesity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fructose goes right to\nthe liver and triggers lipogenesis (the production of fats like triglycerides\nand cholesterol) this is why it is the major cause of liver damage on this\nplanet , and causes a condition called \u201cfatty liver\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-FkrJBveKlgo/Uxi3ZvAt87I/AAAAAAAAp5U/Dgx6RsR-ld4/s1600/eb302cefb9e987ffde3dac6+ds+e3e6f433b.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-FkrJBveKlgo/Uxi3ZvAt87I/AAAAAAAAp5U/Dgx6RsR-ld4/s1600/eb302cefb9e987ffde3dac6+ds+e3e6f433b.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People with fatty liver\nare usually obese, they are fatigued , have sleep apnea, are confused, and they\nhave patchy, dark skin discoloration, usually on the neck or underarm area (\nacanthosis nigricans ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rapidly absorbed\nglucose triggers big spikes in insulin\u2013our body\u2019s major fat storage hormone. &nbsp;Both these features of HFCS lead to increased\nmetabolic disturbances that drive increases in appetite, weight gain, diabetes,\nheart disease, cancer, dementia, and more free fructose from HFCS requires more\nenergy to be absorbed by the gut and soaks up two phosphorous molecules from\nATP (our body\u2019s energy source).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">High doses of free\nfructose have been proven to literally punch holes in the intestinal lining\nallowing nasty byproducts of toxic gut bacteria and partially digested food\nproteins to enter your blood stream and trigger the inflammation that we know\nis at the root of obesity, diabetes, cancer, heart disease, dementia, and\naccelerated aging. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Naturally occurring\nfructose in fruit is part of a complex of nutrients and fiber that doesn\u2019t\nexhibit the same biological effects as the free high fructose doses found in\n\u201ccorn sugar\u201d. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">HFCS often contains\ntoxic levels of mercury because of chlor-alkali products used in its\nmanufacturing. Poisoned sugar is certainly not \u201cnatural\u201d. &nbsp; When HFCS is run through a chemical analyzer\nor a chromatograph, strange chemical peaks show up that are not glucose or\nfructose.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nobody knows what they are , due to high secrecy involved . This certainly\ncalls into question the purity of this processed form of super sugar . &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you\nfind \u201chigh fructose corn syrup\u201d on the label you can be sure it is not a whole,\nreal, fresh food full of fiber, vitamins, minerals, phytonutrients, and\nantioxidants. Stay away if you want to stay healthy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/MOtfeBJK9mI/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/MOtfeBJK9mI&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/MOtfeBJK9mI&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object><br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fructose is a major contributor to:</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Insulin resistance and obesity<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Elevated blood pressure<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Elevated triglycerides and elevated\nLDL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Depletion of vitamins and minerals<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Cardiovascular disease, liver\ndisease, cancer, arthritis and even gout<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every cell in your\nbody, including your brain, utilizes glucose. Therefore, much of it is\n\"burned up\" immediately after you consume it. By contrast, fructose\nis turned into free fatty acids (FFAs), VLDL (the damaging form of\ncholesterol), and triglycerides, which get stored as fat..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fatty acids created\nduring fructose metabolism accumulate as fat droplets in your liver and\nskeletal muscle tissues, causing insulin resistance and non-alcoholic fatty\nliver disease (NAFLD). Insulin resistance progresses to metabolic syndrome and\ntype II diabetes.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JPTr-MpePzU/Uxou45v1NhI/AAAAAAAAqAQ/KOaLWDZJz0o/s1600/imagligdsges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JPTr-MpePzU/Uxou45v1NhI/AAAAAAAAqAQ/KOaLWDZJz0o/s1600/imagligdsges.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you eat 120\ncalories of glucose, less than one calorie is stored as fat. 120 calories of\nfructose results in 40 calories being stored as fat. Consuming fructose is\nessentially consuming fat!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The metabolism of\nfructose by your liver creates a long list of waste products and toxins,\nincluding a large amount of uric acid, which drives up blood pressure and\ncauses gout.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Glucose suppresses the\nhunger hormone ghrelin and stimulates leptin, which suppresses your\nappetite.&nbsp; Fructose has no effect on\nghrelin and interferes with your brain's communication with leptin, resulting\nin overeating<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So, don\u2019t allow anyone\nto give bull to you that &nbsp;\"sugar is\nsugar,\" , for they have an ulterior motive OR are way behind the times. &nbsp;As you can see, there are major differences in\nhow your body processes each one.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/gVyZiYbsvLY/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/gVyZiYbsvLY&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/gVyZiYbsvLY&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Glucose &nbsp;comes from starches like potatoes, our bodies\nproduce it and every cell on the face of the earth has glucose in it. Glucose\nis a molecule absolutely vital to life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fructose however, is\nnot. Humans don\u2019t produce fructose and throughout evolutionary history have\nnever consumed it except seasonally when fruit were ripe, but in smallamounts\nwith several vitamins and minerals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again, understand this\nwell, --Glucose and fructose are metabolized very differently by the body. While\nevery cell in the body can use glucose, the liver is the only organ that can\nmetabolize fructose in significant amounts.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XBOkkWuTnkk/Uxout-smq3I/AAAAAAAAqAI/9-TzGuqO7ps/s1600/ihgvjlmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XBOkkWuTnkk/Uxout-smq3I/AAAAAAAAqAI/9-TzGuqO7ps/s1600/ihgvjlmages.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you have a diet\nthat is high in calories and high in fructose, the liver gets overloaded and\nstarts turning the fructose into fat. Indian women who never had fertility problems\nare now NOT able to conceive and deliver retarded babies due to these GM foods.</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Alzhiemers ,allergy , liver prblmes, kidney\nproblems , diabetes , tumors, cancers were S was unknown in india till we\nstarted eating \u201cgreen revolution\u201d derived GM foods. &nbsp;Fructose doesn\u2019t affect satiety in the same\nway as glucose, making you eat more total calories automatically if your\nfructose intake is high.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Excess fructose consumption may cause leptin\nresistance, throwing body fat regulation out of whack and contributing to\nobesity.&nbsp; The diets of our ancestors\ncontained only very small amounts of fructose. These days, estimates are that\nabout 10% of the modern diet comes from fructose.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/2bQfiNCHphA/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/2bQfiNCHphA&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/2bQfiNCHphA&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When given a free&nbsp; choice, animals avoid GM foods. &nbsp;This was learned by observing a flock of geese\nthat annually visit an Illinois pond and feed on soybeans from an adjacent\nfarm. After half the acreage had GM crops, the geese ate only from the non-GMO\nside. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another observation\nshowed 40 deer ate organic soybeans from one field but shunned the GMO kind\nacross the road. The same thing happened with GM corn. Plants naturally produce\nthousands of chemicals to enhance health and protect against disease. However,\nchanging plant protein may alter these chemicals, increase plant toxins and/or\nreduce its phytonutrients. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gi7LBQKnva0/Uxouh34wLQI/AAAAAAAAqAA/dUm_1I6Dz3M/s1600/aspartame_fizzy_dhgcsrinks.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\">For example, GM\nsoybeans produce less cancer-fighting isoflavones. &nbsp;Crops genetically engineered to be glufosinate\n(herbicide)resistant may produce intestinal herbicide with known toxic effects.\nIf transference to gut bacteria occurs, greater problems may result. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">GM crops accumulate\ntoxins or concentrate them in A1 milk in humpless cows fed GM feed.\nDisease-resistant crops may also produce new plant viruses that affect humans.\nGM foods entered the market long before science could evaluate their safety and\nbenefits, due to Zionist lobbying. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; The chemical \u2014\n4-methylimidazole (4-MI) \u2014 helps to give the drink its colour, but is listed by\nCalifornian health officials as a potential carcinogen.&nbsp; Coca-Cola, Pepsi and other manufacturers\ninsist it is safe at the low doses found in drinks.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A can of cola contains\n40mg of caffeine Caffeine is a stimulant that works on the central nervous\nsystem. It can trigger a dramatic, short-lived increase in blood pressure and\nincreases the heart rate. Caffeine can also stop the body from absorbing iron\nfrom food.&nbsp;&nbsp; The \u2018gender bending\u2019\nchemical BPA, or bisphenol A, has&nbsp; been\nlinked to heart disease, cancer and birth defects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is found in baby\nbottles, plastic forks, CD cases and in the lining of aluminium fizzy drinks\ncans, including those of Coca-Cola.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Studies have revealed\nan average of 59% fructose in HFCS, with some major brands of soda containing\n65% fructose.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me repeat again-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of the\ncarbohydrates we eat are made up of chains of glucose. When glucose enters the\nbloodstream, the body releases insulin to help regulate it. Fructose, on the\nother hand, is processed in the liver. When too much fructose enters the liver,\nthe liver can't process it all fast enough for the body to use as sugar.\nInstead, it starts making fats from the fructose and sending them off into the\nbloodstream as triglycerides.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The liver converts\nexcess fructose into fat for storage, completely bypassing the normal insulin\nresponse from the pancreas which would ordinarily help control blood sugar\nlevels. The result is an increased level of fructose sugar, converted to fat by\nthe liver, but no corresponding feeling of fullness triggered by a sensitivity\nto insulin<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large;\">KIZHAR NELLI , THE\nQUANTUM MEDICINE VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-49idRzh4Pms/UxkjaTdp45I/AAAAAAAAp7Y/BfBf3UkV6zo/s1600/imykages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-49idRzh4Pms/UxkjaTdp45I/AAAAAAAAp7Y/BfBf3UkV6zo/s1600/imykages.jpg\" height=\"299\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Kerala we never had\nfatty liver problem as we used virgin coconut oil for cooking, we drank tender coconut\nwater and our curries were laden with fresh turmeric paste.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nonalcoholic fatty\nliver (NAFLD) is the accumulation of abnormal amounts of fat within the liver.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-fjBbo-z9y5U/Uxk1_oBmcpI/AAAAAAAAp8E/KArwHPSKOCU/s1600/liver3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-fjBbo-z9y5U/Uxk1_oBmcpI/AAAAAAAAp8E/KArwHPSKOCU/s1600/liver3.jpg\" height=\"640\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The liver makes and\nexports fat to other parts of the body. it also removes fat from the blood that\nhas been released by other tissues in the body, for example, by fat cells, or\nabsorbed from the food we eat. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In NAFLD, the handling\nof fat by liver cells is disturbed. increased amounts of fat are removed from\nthe blood and/or are produced by liver cells, and not enough is disposed of or\nexported by the cells. as a result, fat accumulates in the liver.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2aUKDWalo94/Uxk1t4uFu2I/AAAAAAAAp78/J7J-TAKUE5Y/s1600/dangers-jkg+of-hfcs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2aUKDWalo94/Uxk1t4uFu2I/AAAAAAAAp78/J7J-TAKUE5Y/s1600/dangers-jkg+of-hfcs.jpg\" height=\"640\" width=\"406\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NAFLD can be divided\ninto isolated fatty liver in which there is only accumulation of fat, and\nnonalcoholic steatohepatitis (NASH) in which there is fat and damage to liver\ncells..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In both isolated fatty\nliver and NASH there is an abnormal amount of fat in the liver cells, but, in\naddition, in NASH there is inflammation within the liver, and, as a result, the\nliver cells are damaged, they die, and are replaced by scar tissue.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lwX_Pmi8Ylw/Uxk2IQ8ydtI/AAAAAAAAp8M/wZRtUrX0vBg/s1600/liver_large_3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lwX_Pmi8Ylw/Uxk2IQ8ydtI/AAAAAAAAp8M/wZRtUrX0vBg/s1600/liver_large_3.jpg\" height=\"480\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The development of\nNAFLD is intimately associated with obesity and diabetes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People with fatty liver\nare usually obese, they are fatigued , have sleep apnea, are confused, and they\nhave patchy, dark skin discoloration, usually on the neck or underarm area (\nacanthosis nigricans ) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">80% of obese people\nwith diabetes develop NAFLD.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-C9gzugd4ZlI/Uxk1jdMIe2I/AAAAAAAAp70/IHhc-I_wd8w/s1600/article-2219831-1591E1FD00000kuhvduy5DC-58_235x425.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-C9gzugd4ZlI/Uxk1jdMIe2I/AAAAAAAAp70/IHhc-I_wd8w/s1600/article-2219831-1591E1FD00000kuhvduy5DC-58_235x425.jpg\" height=\"640\" width=\"352\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Avoid gluten GM white\nflour , white processed sugar, &nbsp;A1 humped\ncow toxic milk products and hormone injected meats like in KFC</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: lime;\">Below: Singing all the way to the bank.</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-8H_iD3GJnB0/UxlfRtuAm9I/AAAAAAAAp90/GORI3SGFZRs/s1600/original_image-255493-lkjnhyigalleryV9-qtao.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-8H_iD3GJnB0/UxlfRtuAm9I/AAAAAAAAp90/GORI3SGFZRs/s1600/original_image-255493-lkjnhyigalleryV9-qtao.jpg\" height=\"286\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Glyphosate\n(N-(phosphonomethyl)glycine) is a broad-spectrum systemic herbicide which goes\nunder the trade name \"Roundup\". Nearly all GM crops are designed with\ngenes to resist this potent herbicide called Round Up or glyphosate.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-CIAEjrW7J7k/UxldUTukotI/AAAAAAAAp9I/6xACAolReM0/s1600/Phil-Figurehjbiuo-3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-CIAEjrW7J7k/UxldUTukotI/AAAAAAAAp9I/6xACAolReM0/s1600/Phil-Figurehjbiuo-3.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This roundup pesticide\nis very dangerous for human beings.. More than 70 percent of U.S. corn crops\ncontain a special gene added that allows them to produce an insecticide.&nbsp; This way, when bugs attempt to eat the corn\nthey're killed right away (specifically their stomach is split open) because\nthe plant contains an invisible, built-in pesticide shield.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ys6c2fuu4Ls/Uxld1DUhppI/AAAAAAAAp9Y/w4WpCCUY8Hs/s1600/downlovto8oad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ys6c2fuu4Ls/Uxld1DUhppI/AAAAAAAAp9Y/w4WpCCUY8Hs/s1600/downlovto8oad.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The particular gene\nadded to most corn crops is a type of Bt-toxin -- produced from Bacillus\nthuringiensis bacteria. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-8LymYutvGT4/Uxldip2Ws8I/AAAAAAAAp9Q/Xoy5nF6D_og/s1600/6950fhf873.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-8LymYutvGT4/Uxldip2Ws8I/AAAAAAAAp9Q/Xoy5nF6D_og/s1600/6950fhf873.gif\" height=\"310\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bacillus thuringiensis\n(or Bt) is a soil-dwelling bacterium, which also occurs naturally in the gut of\ncaterpillars of various types of moths and animal feces. Crops genetically\nmodified with the bacterium Bt (Bacillus thuringiensis) produce proteins that\nkill pest insects<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-FXKVLORCZn4/UxldOKbk-sI/AAAAAAAAp9A/dNsgdxP6BDc/s1600/imagetdjyhs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-FXKVLORCZn4/UxldOKbk-sI/AAAAAAAAp9A/dNsgdxP6BDc/s1600/imagetdjyhs.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Genetic engineers\nremove the gene that produces the Bt in bacteria and insert it into the DNA of\ncorn (and cotton) plants. This protein has been linked to a rare and understudied allergy to maize in humans.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">The allergic reaction can cause skin rash, swelling or itching of mucous membranes, diarrhea, vomiting, asthma and, in severe cases, anaphylaxis. It is unclear how common this allergy is in the general population.</span></span><br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ByfThc_0GcE/Uxot9mDm05I/AAAAAAAAp_o/PmhQMyCkW-s/s1600/Gm-cor,kjbhrdtyn-2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ByfThc_0GcE/Uxot9mDm05I/AAAAAAAAp_o/PmhQMyCkW-s/s1600/Gm-cor,kjbhrdtyn-2.jpg\" height=\"640\" width=\"614\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Swelling of the\nabdomen, ankles and feet occurs because the liver fails to make albumin. Albumin\nis a &nbsp;major osmolar component of blood\nserum.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The liver is a major\nsite of thrombopoietin production. Thrombopoietin is a glycoprotein hormone\nthat regulates the production of platelets by the bone marrow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The liver synthesizes\nangiotensinogen, a hormone that is responsible for raising the blood pressure\nwhen activated by renin, an enzyme that is released when the kidney senses low\nblood pressure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many diseases of the\nliver are accompanied by jaundice caused by increased levels of bilirubin in\nthe system. The bilirubin results from the breakup of the hemoglobin of dead\nred blood cells; normally, the liver removes bilirubin from the blood and excretes\nit through bile.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Normally, veins return\nblood from the body to the heart, but the portal vein allows chemicals from the\ndigestive tract to enter the liver for \"detoxification\" and filtering\nprior to entering the general circulation.&nbsp;\nThe portal vein also efficiently delivers the chemicals and proteins\nthat liver cells need to produce the proteins, cholesterol, and glycogen\nrequired for normal body activities.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-n16Ze6YZ2cU/UxotyQX_BPI/AAAAAAAAp_g/tqCV5SjumYE/s1600/SipofSodBJHDa.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-n16Ze6YZ2cU/UxotyQX_BPI/AAAAAAAAp_g/tqCV5SjumYE/s1600/SipofSodBJHDa.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many mushrooms are\npoisonous to the liver and eating unidentified mushrooms gathered in the wild\ncan be damage the liver.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The liver is the only\norgan in the body that can easily replace damaged cells, but if enough cells\nare lost, the liver may not be able to meet the needs of the body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hepatitis A is a viral\ninfection that is spread primarily through the fecal-oral route . The\nfecal-oral route is a popular one with perverted homoseuals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-IzoO_0HgYOE/UxorLtKL3HI/AAAAAAAAp-o/ky-Wnu2PszU/s1600/465958-hepatitis-a-fhkyacts.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-IzoO_0HgYOE/UxorLtKL3HI/AAAAAAAAp-o/ky-Wnu2PszU/s1600/465958-hepatitis-a-fhkyacts.jpg\" height=\"360\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hepatitis B is spread\nby exposure to body fluids (needles from drug abusers, contaminated blood, and\nsexual contact) and can cause an acute infection. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-i_T-E6vf_To/UxosOF5cd6I/AAAAAAAAp_A/F1cVeMXKOIc/s1600/hepargrrtitis_b.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-i_T-E6vf_To/UxosOF5cd6I/AAAAAAAAp_A/F1cVeMXKOIc/s1600/hepargrrtitis_b.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hepatitis C is spread\nby exposure to body fluids (needles from drug abusers, contaminated blood, and\nsexual contact). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-EVlJhMhhHIU/Uxor_at-OGI/AAAAAAAAp-4/5ktEpyXJ6kQ/s1600/Causes+of+hewaep+C(4).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-EVlJhMhhHIU/Uxor_at-OGI/AAAAAAAAp-4/5ktEpyXJ6kQ/s1600/Causes+of+hewaep+C(4).jpg\" height=\"302\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hepatitis D is a virus\nthat requires concomitant infection with hepatitis B to survive, and is spread\nvia body fluid exposure (needles from drug abusers, contaminated blood, and\nsexual contact).</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hepatitis E is a virus\nthat is spread via exposure to contaminated food and water.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8dAqBH9dix4/UxosnBT0KOI/AAAAAAAAp_I/GC9cgzuiB5E/s1600/hepatitis_overvrwrgiew.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8dAqBH9dix4/UxosnBT0KOI/AAAAAAAAp_I/GC9cgzuiB5E/s1600/hepatitis_overvrwrgiew.gif\" height=\"425\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the liver has\nbroken down harmful substances, its by-products are excreted into the bile or\nblood. Bile by-products enter the intestine and ultimately leave the body in\nthe form of feces. Blood by-products are filtered out by the kidneys, and leave\nthe body in the form of urine<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NASH or non-alcoholic\nsteatohepatitis&nbsp; ( fatty liver) describes\nthe accumulation of fat within the liver that can cause inflammation of the\nliver and a gradual decrease in liver function.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Normally, bile flows\nfrom the liver into the gallbladder and ultimately into the intestine to help\nwith the digestion of food.&nbsp; If bile flow\nis obstructed, it can cause inflammation within the liver. Most commonly,\ngallstones can cause an obstruction of the ducts that drains bile from the\nliver.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-XzhAtx6dnOQ/UxoteglknDI/AAAAAAAAp_Q/qmtT9QGaOos/s1600/Human-Liver_000003674226XLarge.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-XzhAtx6dnOQ/UxoteglknDI/AAAAAAAAp_Q/qmtT9QGaOos/s1600/Human-Liver_000003674226XLarge.jpg\" height=\"640\" width=\"480\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fat accumulates inside\nthe liver cells, causing cell enlargement (steatosis) and sometimes cell damage\n(steatohepatitis), and can lead to cirrhosis.&nbsp;\nThe liver becomes enlarged, causing discomfort on the upper right side\nof the abdomen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the liver forms scar\ntissue because of an illness, it's called cirrhosis. Jaundice, or yellowing of\nthe skin, is a sign of liver disease<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The liver is necessary\nfor survival, and there is currently no way to compensate for the absence of\nliver function in the long term, although new liver dialysis techniques can be\nused in the short term. If cirrhosis becomes severe, a liver transplant is\nneeded.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;No wonder in Kerala we consider liver an\nimportant body part.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1wVlSkVuXg8/UxotqjGpG8I/AAAAAAAAp_Y/0sqaoj8K0lw/s1600/imakuhvgdsges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1wVlSkVuXg8/UxotqjGpG8I/AAAAAAAAp_Y/0sqaoj8K0lw/s1600/imakuhvgdsges.jpg\" height=\"391\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">SINCE COMMENTS HAVE CROSSED 200 --&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">CLICK ON </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">LOAD MORE</span><span style=\"color: red;\"> TO SEE&nbsp;</span></span></b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: red; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/IcrRgmIUpfs/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/IcrRgmIUpfs&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/IcrRgmIUpfs&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Hindu astrology Shani\nor Saturn is a malefic and cruel planet. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The transit of Saturn\nin the 1st, 4th, 8th and 10th signs either from Lagna, Arudha Lagna or the Moon\nsign cause Kantaka Sani to operate.</span> &nbsp;A<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">rudha lagna deals with maya,\nillusions, perceptions and impressions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kantaka literally means\nthorn . Life becomes miserable as if you have a painful thorn embedded in the\nfoot and you limp through life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During this period, the\ncareer is hampered, finances dwindle and there is deep disappointment in store\nevery which way.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People wonder why\nSabarimala is the world\u2019s No 1 pilgrim destination\u201458 million pilgrims to\nworship Lord Ayyappa , the 9<sup>th</sup> avatar of Vishnu . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/peiAhw7EE3A/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/peiAhw7EE3A&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/peiAhw7EE3A&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">We used to have\nseminars after seminars, &nbsp;on how to save\nfuel. &nbsp;&nbsp;So I shot off a letter to the Chairman stating\nthat the shortest distance between two points A and B is NOT a straight rhumb line\non a Mercator chart , but a great circle ( on a globe ) and this type of\nnavigation can be done only with the aid of a GPS. &nbsp;I also told him, that I hold a private GARMIN\nGPS, but the company ships do NOT have it. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He immediately issued a\nfiat to equip all ships with GPS.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/DpdlJ79ACCo/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/DpdlJ79ACCo&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/DpdlJ79ACCo&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;
