You see Chaitanya baby revealed to Goswami baby that he is an avatar of Krishna ( BALLS !)<br />\n<br />\nGoswami baby created the Radha Raman Temple--which was actually an old Vishnu temple retro installed -- with a shaligram deity of Krishna alongside Radharani.<br />\n<br />\nI WANT MY READERS TO SPREAD THE TRUTH<br />\n<br />\nHARE RAMA OF THE CHANT BY ISKON -- HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH SRI RAM.<br />\n<br />\nCHANTING THIS BULLSHIT MANTRA OF HARE RAMA ( RADHA ) HARE KRISHA DOES YOU NO GOOD<br />\n<br />\nRadha-vallabha is another fake sect--where Krishna is called the consort of Radha. Here Radha is the deity-- Krishna is just a side-kick<br />\n<br />\nShri Radhavallabhlal temple at Vrindavan was a Vishnu temple converted to Radha and Krishna idol - a 2 in 1 .<br />\n<br />\nIN SANKHYA JEW ROTHSCHILD HAS USED HIS AGENTS LIKE PRABHUPADA TO SUBSTITUTE SHIVA / SHAKTI -------WITH KRISHNA ( A MERE AVATAR OF VISHNU ) AND A FAKE MISTRESS RADHA .<br />\n<br />\nPOISON INJECTED VERSES BELOW--<br />\n<br />\nradha purna-sakti, krsna purna-saktiman<br />\ndui vastu bheda nai, sastra-paramana<br />\nmrgamada, tara gandha yaiche aviccheda<br />\nagni, jvalate yaiche kabhu nahi bheda<br />\nradha-krsna aiche sada eka-i svarupa<br />\nlila-rasa asvadite dhare dui-rupa<br />\n<br />\nSri Radha is the full energy, and Lord Krsna is the possessor of full power.<br />\n<br />\nThe two are not different, as evidenced by the revealed scriptures. They are indeed the same, just as musk and its scent are inseparable, or as fire and its heat are nondifferent. Thus Radha and Lord Krsna are one, yet They have taken two forms to enjoy the mellows of pastimes. (Cc. Adi 4.96-98)<br />\n<br />\nisvarera sakti haya e-tina prakara<br />\neka laksmi-gana, pure mahisi-gana ara<br />\nvraje gopi-gana ara sabhate pradhana<br />\nvrajendra-nandana ya'te svayam bhagavan<br />\n<br />\nThe energies (consorts) of the Supreme Lord are of three kinds: the Laksmis in Vaikuntha, the queens in Dvaraka, and the gopis in Vrndavana. The gopis are the best of all, for they have the privilege of serving Sri Krsna, the primeval Lord, the son of the King of Vraja (Cc. Adi 1.79,80)<br />\n<br />\nSORRY -- All this bull about Radha being a mistress of Lord Krishna and all his thousands of Gopikas whom he flirted with , are all poisons injected into Hinduism by the white Christian invader. Kalidas who invented Radha never existed. Krishna did NOT have 16000 virgin gopikas in vrindavan rather 16000 are dhatus of shasrara chakra . SAHASRARA CHAKRA is a 1000 petalled lotus -- each with 16 kalas or aspects --this works out to 16000 .<br />\n<br />\nthis is NOT some girl who has sex with Lord Krishna --taking turns to HUMP.<br />\n<br />\nNarakasura kidnapped 16000 damsels --and Lord Krishna saved these damsels in distress. this is just an allegory.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_56MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_56BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_56B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_57B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5759304704119782162\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_57M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Kama would refer to the totality of the innate desires and drives of man- motivations of man. margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_23.html?showComment=1529848590537#c884639508971628010\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 24, 2018 at 7:26 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_54MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nA major portion of DHARMA is carried out in the Grihasta stage -- where you are creative and do your DUTY for good of society and nation ( age 25 to age 50 ). This is the period when a man demonstrates SELF RESTRAINT .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWhen the scriptural studies appropriate to the student have been completed, and he has received blessings of his Guru, let him enter into the order of the Grihastha (householder). Let him pursue and obtain, by ethical ways, home, wife, children and wealth, discharge to the best of his ability the duties of his life's stage.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n\u2014\u2009Vishnu Purana, 3.IX.1 - 3.IX.31 5000 BC</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIT IS THE LYING WHITE INVADER WHO MADE PRESERVATION OF SEMEN , AND BEING UNMARRIED AS A GREAT QUALIFICATION IN HINDUISM \u2013 SANATANA DHARMA BANS IT . .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIN GRIHASTA STAGE THE MAN IS NOT ALLOWED TO HAVE SEX WITH ANY WOMAN WHO COMES HIS WAY , LIKE HOW THE NAMBOODIRIS DID IN KERALA ( SAMBANDHAM ) .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHE CAN HAVE SEX ONLY WITH HIS WIFE AND CONTINUING HIS LINEAGE IS PART OF HIS DHARMA .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe 7000 year old Vedas lay down that dharma performed by a man alone without his wife is no dharma and will yield no fruit whatsoever. Such is the paramount nature of Grihasta ashrama.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe Vedas hold marriage to be one of the important sacraments sanctifying the body. That is why; marriage is given great importance by the Hindus.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIt is said, \u201cThat man who does not win a wife is really half, and he is not the full man as long as he does not beget an offspring.\u201d A wife is also hailed as\u201d the very source of the Purusharthas, not Only of Dharma, Artha and Kama but even of Moksha.\u2019</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nEvery Hindu god had his wife almost as a part of him, not as a shadow.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nShiva is powerless without Shakti.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMarriage in Sanatana Dharma is NOT for sexual pleasure.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nEvery Hindus man is compulsorily expected to undergo the \u201cvivaha samskara\u201d and run a family (kutumba). Never mind what FREEMASON and Jew Rothschild\u2019s UNMARRIED Vivekananda said .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">Vedas ordain that dharma must be practiced by man together with his wife.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn Sanatana Dharma, marriage is a religious duty, and not a civil contract. It is regarded as one of the most sacred of the sacraments symbolizing the holy and indissoluble union of a couple who thereafter are mutually dependent and indispensable in the performance of religious duties.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nProgeny instrumental to cementing a relationship and for bliss.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: medium;\"><b>Manu Smriti clearly states that \u201che is a perfect man, who consists of his wife, himself and his offspring.\u201d</b></span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nVedas have enjoined that dharma must be observed by man together with his wife. No yagna performed or pilgrimages undertaken will have any effect, if the wife is not a partner in those holy duties during the grihasta and vanaprasta ashramas. During Sanyasa the man can go for pilgrimage on his own.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe early shastras permit unmarried girls to take the whole responsibility upon themselves of choosing their life-mates and enter into wedlock with them. They need to wait for three years only after puberty for some responsible elder to arrange for their marriage, but no more.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn Sanatana Dharma marriages are made in heaven , NOT by LIVING IN TOGETHER ( like in the west ) and examining if the wife can indeed give him a good blow job whenever he wants it\u2014</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n--or vice versa--</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nif the husband can use his tongue power on her fungi affected , smelling like putrid fish part whenever she wishes .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMy own marriage was arranged.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMy elder son\u2019s marriage was arranged</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIN OUR FAMILY THERE HAS NEVER EVER BEEN CAESARIAN BIRTHS \u2013THOUGH INDIA WAS THE FIRST TO DO THIS SURGICAL PROCEDURE.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIT WAS ROTHSCHILD MEDIA AND HISTORIANS WHO GAVE UNWARRANTED PROPAGANDA FOR UNMARRIED HINDU GURUS ( I AM SURE YOU KNOW WHO THEY ARE ) .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nA LOT OF THESE UNMARRIED FAKE GURUS WERE CRYPTO JEW HOMOSEXUALS - -- OR JUST FAKE AND BACKDATED CREATIONS OF THE WHITE INVADER - THEY ARE HEROES IN YOUR NCERT TEXT BOOKS .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIt is the white invader who wrote lies that Hindus ill treat women and suppress them. THE WHITE INVADER INJECTED POISON AND REPLACED LAND BHARAT WITH BHARATA ( SON OF SHAKUNTALA WHO NEVER EXISTED )<br />\n<br />\nBHARATA ( ARJUNAs ANCESTOR ) IS NAMED AFTER BHARATA ( LAND)<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">BHA / BHAVA- EMOTION<br />RA / RAGA- MELODY<br />TA / TALA- RHYTHM</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Natya Shastra like Vedas have NO author as it is a SRUTI . The white invader converted Bharata into a MUNI ( sage ).&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/04/kathakali-dance-form-of-kerala-capt.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>THE ANCESTOR OF PANDAVAS AND KAURAVAS WAS BHARATA ( 8165 BC ) SON OF RISHABHA (8190 BC ) AND ELDER BROTHER OF BAHUBALI</b></span></div>\n<br />\nThe story of Shakuntala has been added as an appendage in the Mahabharata ( Adiparva chapter ) by Jew Rothschild..<br />\n<br />\nCRYPTO JEW Raja Ravi Varma who painted the non-existent Radha ( mistress of Lord Krishna ) does the honours for Shakuntala too.<br />\n<br />\nEmperor Rishabha ( Adinath ) , the father of Chakravatri Bharata is considered as the first Thirthankara. Mahavira was the 24th Thirthankara..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD PUT MONKEY HANUMAN ON THE FLAG OF ARJUNAs CHARIOT.. THE REAL FLAG WAS KRISHNAs FLAG EMBLAZONED WITH VISHNUs CARRIER GARUDA..<br />\n<br />\nBEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA THERE WAS NOT A SINGLE TEMPLE FOR HANUMAN , THE GOD OF THE DEVADASIS ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.html</span><br />\nWHEN THE WHITE INVADER LEFT INDIA IN 1947 THERE WERE 20 TIMES MORE HANUMAN TEMPLES THAN RAM TEMPLES..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/09/garuda-vimana-of-vishnu-and-garuda.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ROTHSCHILD REMOVED SHRADDHA FROM BHAGAWAD GITA AND INSERTED BHAKTI..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE WORD BHAKTI DOES NOT APPEAR IN THE ORIGINAL BHAGAWAD GITA AT ALL.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</span><br />\nI WANT MY READERS TO SPREAD THIS COMMENT TO EVERY HINDU OUTFIT AND STALWART,,&nbsp; THERE ARE MORE THAN TWO LAKH COMMENTS IN MY BLOGSITE..<br />\n<br />\nMANY READERS COME HERE JUST TO READ THE TAAZA COMMENTS -- NOT MY BLOGS ( WHICH THEY SAY ARE TOO LONG )..<br />\n<br />\nHERE WE GO..<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHOLE OF YESTERDAY TWO BENAMI MEDIA COMMIE TV CHANNELS WERE BITCHING ABOUT BAAAD HINDUS ZEALOTS KILLING ATHEIST RATIONALISTS DHABOLKAR , KALBURGI, PANSARE , GAURI LANKESH ETC.<br />\n<br />\nTHESE PATHETIC COMMIES HAD A SINGLE MISSION-- DENIGRATE HINDUS AND SANATANA DHARMA.<br />\n<br />\nTHEY GOT FOREIGN MONEY AND FAME FOR BRANDING SANATANA DHARMA AS A RELIGION OF EXTREME SUPERSTITION AND PAINTING HINDUS AS SAVAGES..<br />\n<br />\nONE WRITER UC ANANTHAMURTHY PISSED ON A VISHNU IDOL BEING WORSHIPED TO PROVE THAT THE IDOL HAS NO POWERS AND CANNOT HIT BACK.. HE WENT AROUND BOASTING.. OUR COLEGIUM JUDICIARY CRIED \u201c FREEDOM OF EXPRESSION\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nBUT WITHIN A WEEK UC ANANTHAMURTHY HAD KIDNEY PROBLEMS AND TO DEFRAY THE EXPENSES OF EXPENSIVE DIALYSIS THE ITALIAN WAITRESS MADE HIM VC OF AN UNIVERSITY..<br />\n<br />\nOF COURSE UC ANATHAMURTHY WOULD NEVER PISS ON A STATUE OF JESUS / MARY OR THE HOLY KORAN TO BRAND THEM POWERLESS TO STRIKE BACK..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ATHEIST RATIONALISTS MUST KNOW THAT SANATANA DHARMA HAS ZERO SUPERSTITION..</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_34MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span>THE DAY MODERN SCIENCE CAN TIDE UP AND BREACH THE LAST FRONTIER TO MEET SANATANA DHARMA AND SEE EYE TO EYE , THERE WILL BE PRALAYA ( COSMIC DISSOLUTION ) DUE TO STAGNATION..<br />\n<br />\nFOR EXAMPLE -- ALBERT EINSTEIN STOLE ALL HIS AWARD WINNING THEORIES FROM VEDANTA..<br />\n<br />\nEINSTEIN JUST PUT SOME MATH AND MADE SUBJECTIVE ANCIENT VEDANTA LOOK LIKE OBJECTIVE MODERN SCIENCE.. THE BEST PART IS THAT HE OUTSOURCED HIS MATH TO INDIA AND HE WAS POOR IN MATH..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/yellapragada-subbarow-nobel-prize-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nVISHNU IS A COSMIC ALLEGORY ..AN ENERGY FIELD --JUST LIKE BRAHMA AND SHIVA ON A MACRO AND MICRO SCALE..<br />\n<br />\nA BLOGGER NAMED CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS THE FIRST TO REVEAL THIS.. THAT IS WHY HE IS THE NO 1 WRITER ON THE PLANET WITH PROFILE VIEW OF 739 MILLION...<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/05/dvaita-vedanta-of-sanatana-dharma-or.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE WIVES OF THE TRINITY ARE ALSO COSMIC ALLEGORIES.<br />\n<br />\nFOR EXAMPLE THE WHITE MAN AND COMMIES WHO ARE INVITED FOR DROHI LITERARY FESTS RIDICULED THAT BRAHMA DID INCEST WITH HIS OWN DAUGHTER SARASWATI..<br />\n<br />\nIF YOU GOOGLE \u201c&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">BRAHMA INCEST</span></b>&nbsp;\u201c YOU WILL GET 4.8 LAKH POSTS ..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">SARASWATI ( WIFE OF BRAHMA ) IS THE MIGHTY QUASAR WHICH IS SEVERAL TRILLION TIMES MORE BRILLIANT THAN THE SUN....</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHE VEDAS WHICH WENT ON ORAL ROUTE FOR 330 CENTURIES BEFORE IT WAS PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO REFERS TO SARASWATI..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/gayatri-mantra-savitr-savitur-saraswati.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">SHIVA WIFE PARVATI ( DEVI/ BHAGAWATI/ DURGA / KALI ) IS A MIGHTY COSMIC ALLEGORY.. IN HER DESTRUCTIVE FORM SHE IS THE BLACK HOLE WHICH CAN DEVOUR ENTIRE GALAXIES IN SECONDS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nLONG AGO WHEN MEAND MY WIFE CLIMBED UP KUDAJADRI MOUNTAIN, MANY READERS ASKED ME WHY I DID THAT..<br />\n<br />\nWELL MY WIFE DID ORGONE ENERGY MAPPING..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/03/kudajadri-mountain-chitramoola-cave-adi.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN THE POST ABOVE I WROTE ABOUT DEVI FOLLOWING ADI SHANKARACHARYA AND TELLING HIM NOT TO LOOK BACK.. NOW, DEVI ( WIFE OF SHIVA ) IS ENERGY.. SHE IS NOT A MORTAL WOMAN..<br />\n<br />\nTHE SPOT ADI SHANKARACHARYA LOOKED BACK, DEVI DISAPPEARED AND HE CONSECRATED THE POWERFUL MOOKAMBIKA TEMPLE THERE ..<br />\n<br />\nTHOUGH THE TEMPLE IS IN KOLOOR KARNATAKA, ONLY MALAYALIS DEVOTEES GO THERE ..WE KNOW WHAT IT IS..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE ARE UNDERGROUND WATER CHANNELS FROM THE TOP OF KUDAJADRI MOUNTAIN TO THE INNER SANCTUM OF MOOKAMBIKA TEMPLE..<br />\n<br />\nDURING THESE RECENT FLOODS THE TEMPLE WAS PARTIALLY SUBERGED..<br />\n<br />\nSAME IN GIZA PYRAMIDS.. I HAD WRITTEN ABOUT THE APEX OF THE PYRAMID EMITTING A BLUE PLASMA GLOW WHICH COULD BE SEEN FOR THOUSANDS OF MILES IN ANCIENT TIMES .. THERE ARE WATER CHANNELS FROM THE RIVER NILE UNDER THE PYRAMIDS..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_34BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span kind=\"d\">\n</span>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_32B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1950966935418826789\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_32M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<span kind=\"d\"><cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. ( GEOMETRY OF OM -108), ULAM SPIRAL, LUCAS NUMBERS, PRIME NUMBER MAGIC , ISOTOPE MAGIC -- EMBEDDED IN IT.&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">THIS IS WHY WE SAY VEDAS WERE DOWNLOADED FROM AKASHA BY MAHARISHIS , AND THERE IS NO MORTAL AUTHOR..</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">BY RECITING VEDIC SRUTI EVERY HUMAN CONDITION OR COSMIC CONDITION COULD BE ADDRESSED AND RESOLVED INSTANTLY ..</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">SANATANA DHARMA IS BASED ON THE SCALAR LONGITUDINAL WAVE WHICH TRAVELS FASTER THAN LIGHT..</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">MY WIFE INTEGRATES ISOTOPE MAGIC ( SRUTI VERSES REDUCED TO DIGITS ) INTO HER DISTANT REIKI\u2014TACHYON ENERGY FASTER THAN LIGHT ..</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">MY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">59.20 %</span></b></span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">Capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\">..</span></div>\n</div>\n<span kind=\"d\">\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_32BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; 1.20: At that time, the son of Pandu, Arjun, who had the insignia of Hanuman (&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">MY LEFT BALL</span></b>&nbsp;) on the flag of his chariot, took up his bow.
