Surely the British would\ndevise something for him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So our man Totakacharya\nwas late for a discourse by Adi Shankaracharya (who was kicked forward in time\nby 2800 years) &nbsp;. &nbsp;The class was held up and one disciple\nexpressed his view that the class must begin without Totakacharya. &nbsp;Peeved Adi Shankaracharya did telepathy and endowed\nour tardy Tota with full knowledge of the shastras . &nbsp;He joined the class and started reciting\nverses after verses in Totaka meter. &nbsp;All\nthis made the Hindus very happy and respectful of the person occupying the hot\nseat, right? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What about Sri Hastamalakacharya\nof Govardhan Mutt Puri. Surely he is also of divine origin as late at 9<sup>th</sup>\ncentury AD. &nbsp;Actually he was an idiot\ntill the age of 13 who could NOT even talk. &nbsp;He started talking as soon as he saw Adi\nShankaracharya. &nbsp;You see he got\nspontaneous knowledge. But hey, there is a story behind this.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is the story QUOTE On the bank of the\nJamuna, a great sage was seated in contemplation when some brahmin girls came\nthere to bathe. One of them had a baby two years old. She placed him by the\nside of the sage and asked him to take care of it till she bathed. The baby\nslowly crawled into the river and was drowned. The mother was aghast. She took\nout the dead body of the child and wept bitterly before the sage. The sage was\nquite oblivious of the happenings awoke from his samadhi. He was moved by pity\nfor the grieving mother. By the powers of his yoga, he left his body and\nentered the body of the child. The dead child sprang into life. That child was\nHastamalaka. This explained how he came to have such an all-comprehensive\nknowledge without any apparent instruction.UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What about Sri\nSureshwaracharya of Sarada Mutt at Sringeri? S urely we must know about his\ngreatness His original nae was Mandana Misra . &nbsp;He embarked on a 8 day debate with Adi\nShankaracharya . Ubhaya Bharati, the wife of Mandana Mishra, agreed to serve as\nthe judge. &nbsp;She gave them each a garland\nof flowers. She said that the person whose garland faded away first was the loser\nof the debate. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After 8 days Misra JI found that his flower garland had faded\nand he fell prostrate on the feet of Adi Shankaracharya .&nbsp; At the end of the marathon debate a pleased\nAdi Shankaracharya made him his disciple and gave him the name of Sri\nSureshwaracharya. &nbsp;&nbsp;Ubhaya Bharati disappeared from the mortal\nvision and regained her celestial form as Saraswati Devi, the Goddess of\nKnowledge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white immoral\nhistorian FU#KED IT UP \u2013 for he did NOT even know that in Sanatana Dharma the\nrishis never debated .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indian maharishis\nwere the first to engage their great minds in dialectics in philosophy\u2014the&nbsp; method of investigating the nature of truth\nby the criticism of initial concepts and hypotheses\u2014all in the most peaceful\nnatural surroundings&nbsp; . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient Indian\nVedic dialectic is based on a dialogue between two or more rishis , master or\nstudent - people who may hold differing views, yet wish to pursue truth by\nseeking agreement with one another. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is in contrast to\ndebate of our man Misra JI &nbsp;in which two\nor more people hold differing views and wish to persuade or prove one another\nwrong (and thus a jury or judge or even a garland of fade HO flowers is needed\nto decide the matter), or rhetoric, which is a relatively long monologue\noration conducted by a single stupid person.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So\u2014so\u2014all the four original\nMutts were formed NOT in 2000 BC, but in the 9<sup>th</sup> century AD , and\nall were &nbsp;manned on the hot seat by super\nmen . &nbsp;Better listen to all of them . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If this is the story of\nthe 4 ORIGINAL mutts, what about the FAKE mutts ? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white historian\nmade Sri Madhvacharya &nbsp;died 1278 AD, &nbsp;as the founder of DVAITA Vedanta, when\nactually it belongs to hoary antiquity with the trinity of Brahma. Vishnu and Shiva.&nbsp; But hey, Madhavachara did NOT have a clue of\nthe real Dvaita Hindusim.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hear this out \u2013 BLAH BLAH\nBLAH-- <i>Dvaita Vedanta (dualistic conclusions of the Vedas) espouses dualism by\ntheorizing the existence of two separate realities. The first and the more\nimportant reality is that of Vishnu or Brahman. &nbsp;BLAH BLAH Vishnu is the supreme Self, God, the\nabsolute truth of the universe, the independent reality. The second reality is\nthat of dependent but equally real universe that exists with its own separate\nessence. BLAH BLAH Everything that is composed of the second reality, such as\nindividual soul (Jiva), matter, etc. exist with their own separate reality. The\ndistinguishing factor of this philosophy as opposed to Advaita Vedanta\n(monistic conclusion of Vedas) is that God takes on a personal role and is seen\nas a real eternal entity that governs and controls the universe</i> -- BLAH BLAH\nFU#KIN\u2019 BLAH&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>TEE HEEEE !</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The traditional year of\nbirth of Adi Sankaracharya was accepted by the Sringeri mutt in the 19th\ncentury as 44 BC.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Recently in 2003 CE the\nSankaracharyas of Puri, &nbsp;Dwaraka and Badrinath\njointly declared in a weak hearted manner , that Adi Sankaracharya was born in\n509 BC. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our NCERT Books are\nstill afraid of Max Muller and they still print Adi Shankaracharya as of 9<sup>th</sup>\ncentury AD.. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Last year they however\nshifted the date of Rig Veda to be 2500 BC instead of 1500 BC as fixed by Max\nMuller, the employee of German Jew Rothschild.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">German Jew Max Muller\neven got Lok Manya Bal Ganghadara Tilak ( a Chitpavan Jew nay Brahmin ) to\nwrite the book ARTIC HOME OF THE VEDAS to show that our Vedas were written by\nthe white skinned blonde haired man. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;QUOTE <i>to\nan Advaitin, Shiva is Vishnu and Vishnu is Siva. &nbsp;Both are one and the same</i>. UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The head of the matha\nis called Jagadguru (teacher to the world) and also carries the Shankaracharya\nname as a title. The present Sringeri Shankaracharya is Shri Bharati Tirtha\nsince 1989. &nbsp;The Sringeri Shankar Mutt\nnow has over 130 branches all over India. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since India became\nIndependent pro-Christian and Islam Congress governments have taken away lands\nof Mutts in the name of Land reforms. &nbsp;So\nmuch so that most Mutts are struggling to maintain themselves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even these small FAKE\nmutts have such nading over taking over procedures all supported by the white\nChristian invader. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Paryaya is a system in\nwhich the eight pontiffs of Udupi undertake the responsibility of worshipping\nLord Krishna and manage the temple by turn for a fixed period of time.&nbsp; The swamiji who is in change of the worship\nand other rituals is known as the paryay swamiji. &nbsp;His Mutt is then known as the Paryaya Mutt.\nThe duration of the tenure is known as the paryaya period.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ceremony of\nhanding over the charge of Sri Krishna Mutt to the new swamiji is known as the\nparyaya festival.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The Carvakas mocked\nreligious ceremonies, calling them inventions of the Brahmins to ensure their\nown livelihood. The authors of the Vedas were \"buffoons, knaves, and\ndemons.\" Those who make ritual offerings of food to the dead, why do they\nnot feed the hungry around them?&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Like the other two heterodox schools, Jainism\nand Buddhism, they criticized the caste system and stood opposed to the ritual\nsacrifice of animals. When the Brahmins defended the latter by claiming that\nthe sacrificed beast goes straight to Swarga Loka (an interim heaven before\nrebirth), the Carvakas asked why the Brahmans did not kill their aged parents\nto hasten their arrival in Swarga Loka. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The R historian has\nwritten that Brahaspati is indeed considered to be the founding father of\nCharvaka thought. , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">PORTUGUESE INQUISITION\nIN GOA ORDERED BY FRANCIS XAVIER &nbsp;VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All these Brahmins ran\nhelter skelter, abandoning their properties and belongings \u2013some of them came\nto Tulu Nadu.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Namboodiris had a\nsystem where only the eldest son married. &nbsp;Rest of the younger brothers had rampant FREE\nSEX with attractive girls and even married women whom they fancied, called\nSAMBANDHAM, and the the offsprings became Kshatyriyas called Nairs . &nbsp;Nairs always carried swords ( like umbrellas )\nand were fiercely loyal to the Namboodiris, &nbsp;who held all the land.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">THE WORST RACISTS ON\nPLANET EARTH VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"> .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of these younger Namboodiri\nbrothers who had NO rights to land or even a proper wife / children came to\nTulu Nadu to start afresh and establish their own roots . They went to Tulu\nNadu away from their elder brother\u2019s influence. This is the reason why Tulu\nLanguage script has so much similarity with Malayalam, thanks to these\nEmbranthiris and the Pottis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later this Tulu script vanished\ninto thin air due to the efforts of Germen Jew Rothschild controlled Basel\nMission and the Gunderts .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Who are the Gunderts?\nThey tried to prove that the 6500 year old Malayalam is just a language born\n300 years ago\u2014and that too like a tape worm parasite in the stomach of Tamil.\nThey stole all the Malayalam books on Math, Science, Astronomy, Astrology,\nHomeopathy, Ayurveda , Scriptures translated into Malayalam etc and took it to\nGermany.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The opportunistic Tamil Iyers were in cahoots.. These same forces\nundermined Tulu language too. Today Tulu is written in Kannada script.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">HERMANN GUNDERT,\nHERMANN HESSE AND MALAYALAM &nbsp;VADAKAYIL.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some people may argue.\nThese people do NOT know how advanced Kerala was in mathematics. Today even BBC\nand Wikipedia accepts it. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>ISAAC NEWTON , THE\nCALCULUS THIEF VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/e13IayEM8Bc/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/e13IayEM8Bc&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/e13IayEM8Bc&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later, some of these Tulu\nBrahmins migrated to Kerala . But they were NOT accepted back as Namboodiris .\nSo these Brahmins continued with their Tulu culture in their daily life. Mind\nyou some of these Tulu Brahmins had married even from attractive low caste\nwomen and even fisher folk from Tulu Land .&nbsp;\n&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After some time , a few\nof them migrated back to Tulu Land where they had better memories and no need\nto do oneupmanship with the Namboodiri Brahmins . &nbsp;They really felt insulted when the pure\nnamboodidris did NOT allow them to participate in homams and rituals , which\nthey were qualified to do.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even today Embranthiris\ndo NOT care for the Tulu patron saint madhavacharya. &nbsp;Being ex- Namboothiris do will not accept any\nAacharya.&nbsp; Namboodris were the highest of\nall the Brahmins as ordained by Lord Parashurama.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today the number of\nTulu speakers is more than 35 lakhs.&nbsp;\nThere is a deep sense of bonding between a Tulu and a Tulu.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Tulu language was\noriginally written using the Tulu script, which is an adaptation of Grantha\nscript.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the beginning of the 20th century the original script was abandoned\nin favour of the Kannada script\u2014again thanks to Basel Mission who had a bone to\npick with the Namboodiris and with Malayalam and anything to do with Malayalam..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Basel Mission would use their printing press to print Tulu prose in Kannada\nalone. &nbsp;The first thing they did was to\ntranslate Bible to Tulu and print it in Kannada. Imagine tomorrow some powerful\nevangelist comes along with monopoly in printing and they start printing Hindi\nin Urdu alone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now taking a query from\none of my readers-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tulu language has four\ndialects, which are broadly similar, with very slight variations.&nbsp; Tulu Brahmins are subdivided into Shivalli\nBrahmins, Sthanika Brahmins , Tuluva Hebbars etc. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sthanika Brahmins or Subramanya Brahmins follow\nSmartha tradition and are followers of Advaita philosophy taught by Adi\nShankaracharya. &nbsp;The Jagadguru of Sringeri\nSharada Peetham is their Kulaguru. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1924\nSringeri Mutt had given a notification that Smaratha Brahmins can be called as\nSubramanya Sthanika Brahmins. Most of the Sthanika Brahmins prefix their native\nplace name in front of their names and many of them have surnames. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shivalli brahmins &nbsp;and Sthanika Brahmins would NOT eneter into\nmarriage alliance.or even eat in the same restaurant. For all this they must\nblame the divide and rule policies of the British for which they uses the\nacharya stooges they installed in their fake mutts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Muslim community of\nTulu Nadu were &nbsp;Arab traders who married\nlocal women and settled there\u2014two arab wives here in desert land &nbsp;and two Indian wives there . &nbsp;Some of these women are good looking.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">. They speak the\nBeary language, which is a mix of Tulu and Malayalam.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of them are Urdu\nspeaking Hyderabadi Razakars who faced severe retribution for their past\nmisdeeds and are still in hiding\u2014and their loyalties are with Pakistan..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google search-</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">RAZAKARS OF MIM ,\nOPERATION POLO TO ANNEX HYDERABAD TO INDIAN UNION &nbsp;VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Till 17<sup>th</sup>\ncentury Malayalam and Tulu ( Tilagari ) alphabets were identical ( Grantha script which evolved from Brahmi ) .&nbsp; From the beginning of 18th century, a close\nversion of the Malayalam alphabet was being used to write Tulu. &nbsp;German Basel missionary Rev. M\u00e4nner, published\nthe first dictionary of the Tulu language in 1886.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern day Tulu\nliterature is written using the Kannada script. &nbsp;Tulu speakers have a separate culture from the\nKannadigas within India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The \u015ahiva\u1e37\u1e37i Brahmins\nwho follow the bullshit Dvaita philosophy founded by Madhvacharya of Udupi are\ncalled Shivalli Madhwa Brahmins. &nbsp;&nbsp;Those\nwho follow the Advaita Vedanta philosophy of Adi Shankaracharya &nbsp;and are known as Shivalli Smartha Brahmins. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shivalli in &nbsp;justa village between Udupi and Manipal\u2014or Shiva-Halli\nwhich means the village of Shiva. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Udupi\nhas two shiva temples Chandramouleshwara temple and Ananteshwara temple near\nthe famous Sri Krishna temple, which has been converted into a Mutt to grab\nPOPE power. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All enter Chandramouleshwara\ntemple and then Ananteshwara temple before entering Krishna Matha on auspicious\noccasion.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are plenty of\nTulu speaking Shivalli Brahmins in Mumbai running Udipi restaurants which serve\ncheap , hygienic , mouth watering dishes.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In kerala we have Tulu\nassociations all over \u2013 as Malayalis are educated and tolerant. Tuluvas have\nmore in common with Malayalis than Kannadigas\u2014I am sure all of them know that. &nbsp;&nbsp;Both follow matrilineal system, &nbsp;use coconut oil and boiled rice and have\nsimilar physical and facial features.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brahmins who carry the surname Potty are\ndivided in to Malayalam speaking and Tulu speaking.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Brahmins of the\nDakshina Kannada district have had the ancient tradition of going to centers of\nlearning in Kerala for higher studies in scriptures, &nbsp;Math, &nbsp;Ayurveda Astronomy and Astrology. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No Tuluva pride or Kannadiga pride can wish this away.\n&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It were this scholars who invented the\nTulu scripts , first for mantras and then for knowledge. font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">NOBODY HAS UNDERSTOOD\nHINDUISM SINCE ADI SHANKARACHARYA OF 2000 BC\u2014and few German Quantum physicists\n( who all converted to Hinduism and got cremated. .)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shiva Lingam contains\nthe soul-seed ( DNA ) within which lies the essence of the entire cosmos.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Water holds memory.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Copper kalasha drips\nwater right on top of the shiva lingam and this water bathes the lingam\nuniformly. In ancient days this water used to be LIVING ganges water.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The base has a run off\nfor water \u2013 and this water is holy theertham . The white man called the Lingam\nas Shiva\u2019s erect phallus and the run off base for water as YONI( vagina \u2013 note\nthe extreme sarcasm ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL LIFE ON THIS PLANET\nEARTH CAME FROM SHIVA LINGAM \u2013 A BLACK METRORITE STONE . WHEREVER WE FOUND SUCH\nA STONE, THE HINDUS MADE A TEMPLE OVER IT .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have been telling\nthis in my posts .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">One day, three years\nago NASA agreed with capt ajit vadakayil.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; Bodies are flesh, fat and blood. Do not fail to remember this again and again in your mind.</span></td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u0928\u0932\u093f\u0928\u0940\u0926\u0932\u0917\u0924 \u091c\u0932\u092e\u0924\u093f\u0924\u0930\u0932\u0902<br />\u0924\u0926\u094d\u0935\u091c\u094d\u091c\u0940\u0935\u093f\u0924\u092e\u0924\u093f\u0936\u092f\u091a\u092a\u0932\u092e\u094d .<br />\u0935\u093f\u0926\u094d\u0927\u093f \u0935\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0927\u094d\u092f\u092d\u093f\u092e\u093e\u0928\u0917\u094d\u0930\u0938\u094d\u0924\u0902<br />\u0932\u094b\u0915\u0902 \u0936\u094b\u0915\u0939\u0924\u0902 \u091a \u0938\u092e\u0938\u094d\u0924\u092e\u094d .. \u096a..</span></td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<span style=\"font-weight: bold;\">Text 4</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\">nalin\u012bdalagata jalamatitaralam\u0307<br />\ntadvajj\u012bvitamati\u015bayacapalam |<br />\nviddhi vy\u0101dhyabhim\u0101nagrastam\u0307<br />\nlokam\u0307 \u015bokahatam\u0307 ca samastam || 4</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: #000088;\">Uncertain is the life of man as rain drops on a lotus leaf. Know that the whole world remains a prey to disease, ego and grief.</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u092f\u093e\u0935\u0926\u094d\u0935\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0924\u094b\u092a\u093e\u0930\u094d\u091c\u0928 \u0938\u0915\u094d\u0924\u0903<br />\u0938\u094d\u0924\u093e\u0935\u0928\u094d\u0928\u093f\u091c \u092a\u0930\u093f\u0935\u093e\u0930\u094b \u0930\u0915\u094d\u0924\u0903 .<br />\u092a\u0936\u094d\u091a\u093e\u091c\u094d\u091c\u0940\u0935\u0924\u093f \u091c\u0930\u094d\u091c\u0930 \u0926\u0947\u0939\u0947<br />\u0935\u093e\u0930\u094d\u0924\u093e\u0902 \u0915\u094b\u093d\u092a\u093f \u0928 \u092a\u0943\u091a\u094d\u091b\u0924\u093f \u0917\u0947\u0939\u0947 .. \u096b..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 5</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\ny\u0101vadvittop\u0101rjana saktah\u0323<br />\nst\u0101vannija pariv\u0101ro raktah\u0323 |<br />\npa\u015bc\u0101jj\u012bvati jarjara dehe<br />\nv\u0101rt\u0101m\u0307 ko'pi na pr\u0323cchati gehe || 5</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">So long as a man is fit and able to support his family, see the affection all those around him show. But no one at home cares to even have a word with him when his body totters due to old age.</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u092f\u093e\u0935\u0924\u094d\u092a\u0935\u0928\u094b \u0928\u093f\u0935\u0938\u0924\u093f \u0926\u0947\u0939\u0947<br />\u0924\u093e\u0935\u0924\u094d\u092a\u0943\u091a\u094d\u091b\u0924\u093f \u0915\u0941\u0936\u0932\u0902 \u0917\u0947\u0939\u0947 .<br />\u0917\u0924\u0935\u0924\u093f \u0935\u093e\u092f\u094c \u0926\u0947\u0939\u093e\u092a\u093e\u092f\u0947<br />\u092d\u093e\u0930\u094d\u092f\u093e \u092c\u093f\u092d\u094d\u092f\u0924\u093f \u0924\u0938\u094d\u092e\u093f\u0928\u094d\u0915\u093e\u092f\u0947 .. \u096c..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 6</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\ny\u0101vatpavano nivasati dehe<br />\nt\u0101vatpr\u0323cchati ku\u015balam\u0307 gehe |<br />\ngatavati v\u0101yau deh\u0101p\u0101ye<br />\nbh\u0101ry\u0101 bibhyati tasmink\u0101ye || 6</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">When one is alive, his family members enquire kindly about his welfare. But when the soul departs from the body, even his wife runs away in fear of the corpse.</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u092c\u093e\u0932\u0938\u094d\u0924\u093e\u0935\u0924\u094d\u0915\u094d\u0930\u0940\u0921\u093e\u0938\u0915\u094d\u0924\u0903<br />\u0924\u0930\u0941\u0923\u0938\u094d\u0924\u093e\u0935\u0924\u094d\u0924\u0930\u0941\u0923\u0940\u0938\u0915\u094d\u0924\u0903 .<br />\u0935\u0943\u0926\u094d\u0927\u0938\u094d\u0924\u093e\u0935\u091a\u094d\u091a\u093f\u0928\u094d\u0924\u093e\u0938\u0915\u094d\u0924\u0903<br />\u092a\u0930\u0947 \u092c\u094d\u0930\u0939\u094d\u092e\u0923\u093f \u0915\u094b\u093d\u092a\u093f \u0928 \u0938\u0915\u094d\u0924\u0903 .. \u096d..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 7</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\nb\u0101last\u0101vatkr\u012bd\u0323\u0101saktah\u0323<br />\ntarun\u0323ast\u0101vattarun\u0323\u012bsaktah\u0323 |<br />\nvr\u0323ddhast\u0101vaccint\u0101saktah\u0323<br />\npare brahman\u0323i ko'pi na saktah\u0323 || 7</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">Childhood is lost in play. Youth is lost by attachment to woman. Old age passes away by thinking over many past things. Alas! Hardly is there anyone who yearns to be lost in Parabrahman.</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\">\n</div>\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u0915\u093e\u0924\u0947 \u0915\u093e\u0928\u094d\u0924\u093e \u0915\u0938\u094d\u0924\u0947 \u092a\u0941\u0924\u094d\u0930\u0903<br />\u0938\u0902\u0938\u093e\u0930\u094b\u093d\u092f\u092e\u0924\u0940\u0935 \u0935\u093f\u091a\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0930\u0903 .<br />\u0915\u0938\u094d\u092f \u0924\u094d\u0935\u0902 \u0915\u0903 \u0915\u0941\u0924 \u0906\u092f\u093e\u0924\u0903<br />\u0924\u0924\u094d\u0924\u094d\u0935\u0902 \u091a\u093f\u0928\u094d\u0924\u092f \u0924\u0926\u093f\u0939 \u092d\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0924\u0903 .. \u096e..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 8</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\nk\u0101te k\u0101nt\u0101 kaste putrah\u0323<br />\nsam\u0307s\u0101ro'yamat\u012bva vicitrah\u0323 |<br />\nkasya tvam\u0307 kah\u0323 kuta \u0101y\u0101tah\u0323<br />\ntattvam\u0307 cintaya tadiha bhr\u0101tah\u0323 || 8</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">Who is your wife? Who is your son? Strange is this samsara. Of whom are you? Where have you come from? Brother, ponder over these truths.</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\">\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\">\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u0938\u0924\u094d\u0938\u0919\u094d\u0917\u0924\u094d\u0935\u0947 \u0928\u093f\u0938\u094d\u0938\u094d\u0919\u094d\u0917\u0924\u094d\u0935\u0902<br />\u0928\u093f\u0938\u094d\u0938\u0919\u094d\u0917\u0924\u094d\u0935\u0947 \u0928\u093f\u0930\u094d\u092e\u094b\u0939\u0924\u094d\u0935\u092e\u094d .<br />\u0928\u093f\u0930\u094d\u092e\u094b\u0939\u0924\u094d\u0935\u0947 \u0928\u093f\u0936\u094d\u091a\u0932\u0924\u0924\u094d\u0924\u094d\u0935\u0902<br />\u0928\u093f\u0936\u094d\u091a\u0932\u0924\u0924\u094d\u0924\u094d\u0935\u0947 \u091c\u0940\u0935\u0928\u094d\u092e\u0941\u0915\u094d\u0924\u093f\u0903 .. \u096f..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 9</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\nsatsan\u0323gatve nissn\u0323gatvam\u0307<br />\nnissan\u0323gatve nirmohatvam |<br />\nnirmohatve ni\u015bcalatattvam\u0307<br />\nni\u015bcalatattve j\u012bvanmuktih\u0323 || 9</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">From Satsanga comes non-attachment, from non-attachment comes freedom from delusion, which leads to self-settledness. From self-settledness comes Jivan Mukti (liberation).</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\">\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\">\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI';
