font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u0935\u092f\u0938\u093f\u0917\u0924\u0947 \u0915\u0903 \u0915\u093e\u092e\u0935\u093f\u0915\u093e\u0930\u0903<br />\u0936\u0941\u0937\u094d\u0915\u0947 \u0928\u0940\u0930\u0947 \u0915\u0903 \u0915\u093e\u0938\u093e\u0930\u0903 .<br />\u0915\u094d\u0937\u0940\u0923\u0947\u0935\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0924\u0947 \u0915\u0903 \u092a\u0930\u093f\u0935\u093e\u0930\u0903<br />\u091c\u094d\u091e\u093e\u0924\u0947 \u0924\u0924\u094d\u0924\u094d\u0935\u0947 \u0915\u0903 \u0938\u0902\u0938\u093e\u0930\u0903 .. \u0967\u0966..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 10</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\nvayasigate kah\u0323 k\u0101mavik\u0101rah\u0323<br />\n\u015bus\u0323ke n\u012bre kah\u0323 k\u0101s\u0101rah\u0323 |<br />\nk\u015b\u012bn\u0323evitte kah\u0323 pariv\u0101rah\u0323<br />\nj\u00f1\u0101te tattve kah\u0323 sam\u0307s\u0101rah\u0323 || 10</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">What good is lust when youth has fled? What use is a lake which has no water? Where are the relatives when wealth is gone? Where is samsara (the continuaiton of birth and death) when the Truth is known?</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u092e\u093e \u0915\u0941\u0930\u0941 \u0927\u0928 \u091c\u0928 \u092f\u094c\u0935\u0928 \u0917\u0930\u094d\u0935\u0902<br />\u0939\u0930\u0924\u093f \u0928\u093f\u092e\u0947\u0937\u093e\u0924\u094d\u0915\u093e\u0932\u0903 \u0938\u0930\u094d\u0935\u092e\u094d .<br />\u092e\u093e\u092f\u093e\u092e\u092f\u092e\u093f\u0926\u092e\u0916\u093f\u0932\u0902 \u0939\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0935\u093e<br />\u092c\u094d\u0930\u0939\u094d\u092e\u092a\u0926\u0902 \u0924\u094d\u0935\u0902 \u092a\u094d\u0930\u0935\u093f\u0936 \u0935\u093f\u0926\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0935\u093e .. \u0967\u0967..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 11</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;tahoma&quot;;\">m\u0101 kuru dhana jana yauvana garvam\u0307<br />harati nimes\u0323\u0101tk\u0101lah\u0323 sarvam |<br />m\u0101y\u0101mayamidamakhilam\u0307 hitv\u0101<br />brahmapadam\u0307 tvam\u0307 pravi\u015ba viditv\u0101 || 11</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">Do not boast of wealth, friends, and youth. Each one of these are destroyed within a minute. Free yourself from the illusion of the world of Maya and attain the timeless Truth.</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u0926\u093f\u0928\u092f\u093e\u092e\u093f\u0928\u094d\u092f\u094c \u0938\u093e\u092f\u0902 \u092a\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0924\u0903<br />\u0936\u093f\u0936\u093f\u0930\u0935\u0938\u0928\u094d\u0924\u094c \u092a\u0941\u0928\u0930\u093e\u092f\u093e\u0924\u0903 .<br />\u0915\u093e\u0932\u0903 \u0915\u094d\u0930\u0940\u0921\u0924\u093f \u0917\u091a\u094d\u091b\u0924\u094d\u092f\u093e\u092f\u0941\u0903<br />\u0924\u0926\u092a\u093f \u0928 \u092e\u0941\u091e\u094d\u091a\u0924\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0936\u093e\u0935\u093e\u092f\u0941\u0903 .. \u0967\u0968..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 12</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\ndinay\u0101minyau s\u0101yam\u0307 pr\u0101tah\u0323<br />\n\u015bi\u015biravasantau punar\u0101y\u0101tah\u0323 |<br />\nk\u0101lah\u0323 kr\u012bd\u0323ati gacchaty\u0101yuh\u0323<br />\ntadapi na mu\u00f1caty\u0101\u015b\u0101v\u0101yuh\u0323 || 12</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">Daylight and darkness, dusk and dawn, winter and springtime come and go. Time plays and life ebbs away. But the storm of desire never leaves.</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u0926\u094d\u0935\u093e\u0926\u0936\u092e\u091e\u094d\u091c\u0930\u093f\u0915\u093e\u092d\u093f\u0930\u0936\u0947\u0937\u0903<br />\u0915\u0925\u093f\u0924\u094b \u0935\u0948\u092f\u093e\u0915\u0930\u0923\u0938\u094d\u092f\u0948\u0937\u0903 .<br />\u0909\u092a\u0926\u0947\u0936\u094b \u092d\u0942\u0926\u094d\u0935\u093f\u0926\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0928\u093f\u092a\u0941\u0923\u0948\u0903<br />\u0936\u094d\u0930\u0940\u092e\u091a\u094d\u091b\u0928\u094d\u0915\u0930\u092d\u0917\u0935\u091a\u094d\u091b\u0930\u0923\u0948\u0903 .. \u0967\u0969..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 13</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\ndv\u0101da\u015bama\u00f1jarik\u0101bhira\u015bes\u0323ah\u0323<br />\nkathito vaiy\u0101karan\u0323asyais\u0323ah\u0323 |<br />\nupade\u015bo bh\u016bdvidy\u0101nipun\u0323aih\u0323<br />\n\u015br\u012bmacchankarabhagavaccharan\u0323arih\u0323 || 13</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">This bouquet of twelve verses was imparted to a grammarian by the all-knowing Shankara, adored as the bhagavadpada.</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u0915\u093e\u0924\u0947 \u0915\u093e\u0928\u094d\u0924\u093e \u0927\u0928 \u0917\u0924\u091a\u093f\u0928\u094d\u0924\u093e<br />\u0935\u093e\u0924\u0941\u0932 \u0915\u093f\u0902 \u0924\u0935 \u0928\u093e\u0938\u094d\u0924\u093f \u0928\u093f\u092f\u0928\u094d\u0924\u093e .<br />\u0924\u094d\u0930\u093f\u091c\u0917\u0924\u093f \u0938\u091c\u094d\u091c\u0928\u0938\u0902 \u0917\u0924\u093f\u0930\u0948\u0915\u093e<br />\u092d\u0935\u0924\u093f \u092d\u0935\u093e\u0930\u094d\u0923\u0935\u0924\u0930\u0923\u0947 \u0928\u094c\u0915\u093e .. \u0967\u096a..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 14</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\nk\u0101te k\u0101nt\u0101 dhana gatacint\u0101<br />\nv\u0101tula kim\u0307 tava n\u0101sti niyant\u0101 |<br />\ntrijagati sajjanasam\u0307 gatiraik\u0101<br />\nbhavati bhav\u0101rn\u0323avataran\u0323e nauk\u0101 || 14</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">Oh mad man! Why this engrossment in thoughts of wealth? Is there no one to guide you? There is only one thing in three worlds that can save you from the ocean of samsara. Get into that boat of satsangha (knowledge of the Truth) quickly.</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u091c\u091f\u093f\u0932\u094b \u092e\u0941\u0923\u094d\u0921\u0940 \u0932\u0941\u091e\u094d\u091b\u093f\u0924\u0915\u0947\u0936\u0903<br />\u0915\u093e\u0937\u093e\u092f\u093e\u092e\u094d\u092c\u0930\u092c\u0939\u0941\u0915\u0943\u0924\u0935\u0947\u0937\u0903 .<br />\u092a\u0936\u094d\u092f\u0928\u094d\u0928\u092a\u093f \u091a\u0928 \u092a\u0936\u094d\u092f\u0924\u093f \u092e\u0942\u0922\u0903<br />\u0909\u0926\u0930\u0928\u093f\u092e\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0924\u0902 \u092c\u0939\u0941\u0915\u0943\u0924\u0935\u0947\u0937\u0903 .. \u0967\u096b..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 15</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\njat\u0323ilo mun\u0323d\u0323\u012b lu\u00f1chitake\u015bah\u0323<br />\nk\u0101s\u0323\u0101y\u0101mbarabahukr\u0323taves\u0323ah\u0323 |<br />\npa\u015byannapi cana pa\u015byati m\u016bd\u0323hah\u0323<br />\nudaranimittam\u0307 bahukr\u0323taves\u0323ah\u0323 || 15</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">There are many who go with matted locks, many who have clean shaven heads, many whose hairs have been plucked out; some are clothed in saffron, yet others in various colors --- all just for a livelihood. Seeing truth revealed before them, still the foolish ones see it not.</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u0905\u0919\u094d\u0917\u0902 \u0917\u0932\u093f\u0924\u0902 \u092a\u0932\u093f\u0924\u0902 \u092e\u0941\u0923\u094d\u0921\u0902<br />\u0926\u0936\u0928\u0935\u093f\u0939\u0940\u0928\u0902 \u091c\u0924\u0902 \u0924\u0941\u0923\u094d\u0921\u092e\u094d .<br />\u0935\u0943\u0926\u094d\u0927\u094b \u092f\u093e\u0924\u093f \u0917\u0943\u0939\u0940\u0924\u094d\u0935\u093e \u0926\u0923\u094d\u0921\u0902<br />\u0924\u0926\u092a\u093f \u0928 \u092e\u0941\u091e\u094d\u091a\u0924\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0936\u093e\u092a\u093f\u0923\u094d\u0921\u092e\u094d .. \u0967\u096c..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 16</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\nan\u0323gam\u0307 galitam\u0307 palitam\u0307 mun\u0323d\u0323am\u0307<br />\nda\u015banavih\u012bnam\u0307 jatam\u0307 tun\u0323d\u0323am |<br />\nvr\u0323iddho y\u0101ti gr\u0323ih\u012btv\u0101 dan\u0323d\u0323am\u0307<br />\ntadapi na mu\u00f1caty\u0101\u015b\u0101pin\u0323d\u0323am || 16</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">Strength has left the old man's body; his head has become bald, his gums toothless and leaning on crutches. Even then the attachment is strong and he clings firmly to fruitless hope.</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u0905\u0917\u094d\u0930\u0947 \u0935\u0939\u094d\u0928\u093f\u0903 \u092a\u0943\u0937\u094d\u0920\u0947\u092d\u093e\u0928\u0941\u0903<br />\u0930\u093e\u0924\u094d\u0930\u094c \u091a\u0941\u092c\u0941\u0915\u0938\u092e\u0930\u094d\u092a\u093f\u0924\u091c\u093e\u0928\u0941\u0903 .<br />\u0915\u0930\u0924\u0932\u092d\u093f\u0915\u094d\u0937\u0938\u094d\u0924\u0930\u0941\u0924\u0932\u0935\u093e\u0938\u0903<br />\u0924\u0926\u092a\u093f \u0928 \u092e\u0941\u091e\u094d\u091a\u0924\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0936\u093e\u092a\u093e\u0936\u0903 .. \u0967\u096d..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 17</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\nagre vahnih\u0323 pr\u0323s\u0323t\u0323hebh\u0101nuh\u0323<br />\nr\u0101trau cubukasamarpitaj\u0101nuh\u0323 |<br />\nkaratalabhik\u015bastarutalav\u0101sah\u0323<br />\ntadapi na mu\u00f1caty\u0101\u015b\u0101p\u0101\u015bah\u0323 || 17</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">Behold there lies the man who sits warming up his body with the fire in front and the sun at the back; at night he curls up the body to keep out of the cold; he eats his beggar's food from the bowl of his hand and sleeps beneath the tree. Still in his heart, he is a wretched puppet at the hands of passions.</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u0915\u0941\u0930\u0941\u0924\u0947 \u0917\u0919\u094d\u0917\u093e\u0938\u093e\u0917\u0930\u0917\u092e\u0928\u0902<br />\u0935\u094d\u0930\u0924\u092a\u0930\u093f\u092a\u093e\u0932\u0928\u092e\u0925\u0935\u093e \u0926\u093e\u0928\u092e\u094d .<br />\u091c\u094d\u091e\u093e\u0928\u0935\u093f\u0939\u093f\u0928\u0903 \u0938\u0930\u094d\u0935\u092e\u0924\u0947\u0928<br />\u092e\u0941\u0915\u094d\u0924\u093f\u0902 \u0928 \u092d\u091c\u0924\u093f \u091c\u0928\u094d\u092e\u0936\u0924\u0947\u0928 .. \u0967\u096e..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 18</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\nkurute gan\u0307g\u0101s\u0101garagamanam\u0307<br />\nvrataparip\u0101lanamathav\u0101 d\u0101nam |<br />\nj\u00f1\u0101navihinah\u0323 sarvamatena<br />\nmuktim\u0307 na bhajati janma\u015batena || 18</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">One may go to the Ganga, observe fasts, and give away riches in charity! Yet, devoid of jnana, nothing can give mukthi even at the end of a hundred births.</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u0938\u0941\u0930 \u092e\u0902\u0926\u093f\u0930 \u0924\u0930\u0941 \u092e\u0942\u0932 \u0928\u093f\u0935\u093e\u0938\u0903<br />\u0936\u092f\u094d\u092f\u093e \u092d\u0942\u0924\u0932 \u092e\u091c\u093f\u0928\u0902 \u0935\u093e\u0938\u0903 .<br />\u0938\u0930\u094d\u0935 \u092a\u0930\u093f\u0917\u094d\u0930\u0939 \u092d\u094b\u0917 \u0924\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0917\u0903<br />\u0915\u0938\u094d\u092f \u0938\u0941\u0916\u0902 \u0928 \u0915\u0930\u094b\u0924\u093f \u0935\u093f\u0930\u093e\u0917\u0903 .. \u0967\u096f..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 19</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\nsura mandira taru m\u016bla niv\u0101sah\u0323<br />\n\u015bayy\u0101 bh\u016btala majinam\u0307 v\u0101sah\u0323 |<br />\nsarva parigraha bhoga ty\u0101gah\u0323<br />\nkasya sukham\u0307 na karoti vir\u0101gah\u0323 || 19</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">Take your residence in a temple or below a tree, wear the deerskin for the dress, and sleep with mother earth as your bed. Give up all attachments and renounce all comforts. Blessed with such vairagya, could any fail to be content?</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u092f\u094b\u0917\u0930\u0924\u094b \u0935\u093e\u092d\u094b\u0917\u0930\u0924\u094b\u0935\u093e<br />\u0938\u0919\u094d\u0917\u0930\u0924\u094b \u0935\u093e \u0938\u0919\u094d\u0917\u0935\u0940\u0939\u093f\u0928\u0903 .<br />\u092f\u0938\u094d\u092f \u092c\u094d\u0930\u0939\u094d\u092e\u0923\u093f \u0930\u092e\u0924\u0947 \u091a\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0924\u0902<br />\u0928\u0928\u094d\u0926\u0924\u093f \u0928\u0928\u094d\u0926\u0924\u093f \u0928\u0928\u094d\u0926\u0924\u094d\u092f\u0947\u0935 .. \u0968\u0966..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 20</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\nyogarato v\u0101bhogaratov\u0101<br />\nsan\u0323garato v\u0101 san\u0323gav\u012bhinah\u0323 |<br />\nyasya brahman\u0323i ramate cittam\u0307<br />\nnandati nandati nandatyeva || 20</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">One may take delight in yoga or bhoga, may have attachment or detachment. But only he whose mind steadily delights in Brahman enjoys bliss, no one else.</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u092d\u0917\u0935\u0926\u094d \u0917\u0940\u0924\u093e \u0915\u093f\u091e\u094d\u091a\u093f\u0926\u0927\u0940\u0924\u093e<br />\u0917\u0919\u094d\u0917\u093e \u091c\u0932\u0932\u0935 \u0915\u0923\u093f\u0915\u093e\u092a\u0940\u0924\u093e .<br />\u0938\u0915\u0943\u0926\u092a\u093f \u092f\u0947\u0928 \u092e\u0941\u0930\u093e\u0930\u093f \u0938\u092e\u0930\u094d\u091a\u093e<br />\u0915\u094d\u0930\u093f\u092f\u0924\u0947 \u0924\u0938\u094d\u092f \u092f\u092e\u0947\u0928 \u0928 \u091a\u0930\u094d\u091a\u093e .. \u0968\u0967..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 21</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\nbhagavad g\u012bt\u0101 ki\u00f1cidadh\u012bt\u0101<br />\ngan\u0323g\u0101 jalalava kan\u0323ik\u0101p\u012bt\u0101 |<br />\nsakr\u0323dapi yena mur\u0101ri samarc\u0101<br />\nkriyate tasya yamena na carc\u0101 || 21</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">Let a man read but a little from the Bhagavad-Gita, drink just a drop of water from the Ganga, worship Murari (Krishna) just once. He then will have no altercation with Yama (the lord of death).</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u092a\u0941\u0928\u0930\u092a\u093f \u091c\u0928\u0928\u0902 \u092a\u0941\u0928\u0930\u092a\u093f \u092e\u0930\u0923\u0902<br />\u092a\u0941\u0928\u0930\u092a\u093f \u091c\u0928\u0928\u0940 \u091c\u0920\u0930\u0947 \u0936\u092f\u0928\u092e\u094d .<br />\u0907\u0939 \u0938\u0902\u0938\u093e\u0930\u0947 \u092c\u0939\u0941\u0926\u0941\u0938\u094d\u0924\u093e\u0930\u0947<br />\u0915\u0943\u092a\u092f\u093e\u093d\u092a\u093e\u0930\u0947 \u092a\u093e\u0939\u093f \u092e\u0941\u0930\u093e\u0930\u0947 .. \u0968\u0968..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 22</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\npunarapi jananam\u0307 punarapi maran\u0323am\u0307<br />\npunarapi janan\u012b jat\u0323hare \u015bayanam |<br />\niha sam\u0307s\u0101re bahudust\u0101re<br />\nkr\u0323pay\u0101'p\u0101re p\u0101hi mur\u0101re ||22</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">Born again, death again, birth again to stay in the mother's womb! It is indeed hard to cross this boundless ocean of samsara. Oh Murari! Redeem me through Thy mercy.</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u0930\u0925\u094d\u092f\u093e \u091a\u0930\u094d\u092a\u091f \u0935\u093f\u0930\u091a\u093f\u0924 \u0915\u0928\u094d\u0925\u0903<br />\u092a\u0941\u0923\u094d\u092f\u093e\u092a\u0941\u0923\u094d\u092f \u0935\u093f\u0935\u0930\u094d\u091c\u093f\u0924 \u092a\u0928\u094d\u0925\u0903 .<br />\u092f\u094b\u0917\u0940 \u092f\u094b\u0917\u0928\u093f\u092f\u094b\u091c\u093f\u0924 \u091a\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0924\u094b<br />\u0930\u092e\u0924\u0947 \u092c\u093e\u0932\u094b\u0928\u094d\u092e\u0924\u094d\u0924\u0935\u0926\u0947\u0935 .. \u0968\u0969..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 23</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\nrathy\u0101 carpat\u0323a viracita kanthah\u0323<br />\npun\u0323y\u0101pun\u0323ya vivarjita panthah\u0323 |<br />\nyog\u012b yoganiyojita citto<br />\nramate b\u0101lonmattavadeva || 23</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">There is no shortage of clothing for a monk so long as there are rags cast off the road. Freed from vice and virtue, onward he wanders. One who lives in communion with God enjoys bliss, pure and uncontaminated, like a child and as someone intoxicated.</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u0915\u0938\u094d\u0924\u094d\u0935\u0902 \u0915\u094b\u093d\u0939\u0902 \u0915\u0941\u0924 \u0906\u092f\u093e\u0924\u0903<br />\u0915\u093e \u092e\u0947 \u091c\u0928\u0928\u0940 \u0915\u094b \u092e\u0947 \u0924\u093e\u0924\u0903 .<br />\u0907\u0924\u093f \u092a\u0930\u093f\u092d\u093e\u0935\u092f \u0938\u0930\u094d\u0935\u092e\u0938\u093e\u0930\u092e\u094d<br />\u0935\u093f\u0936\u094d\u0935\u0902 \u0924\u094d\u092f\u0915\u094d\u0924\u094d\u0935\u093e \u0938\u094d\u0935\u092a\u094d\u0928 \u0935\u093f\u091a\u093e\u0930\u092e\u094d .. \u0968\u096a..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 24</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\nkastvam\u0307 ko'ham\u0307 kuta \u0101y\u0101tah\u0323<br />\nk\u0101 me janan\u012b ko me t\u0101tah\u0323 |<br />\niti paribh\u0101vaya sarvamas\u0101ram<br />\nvi\u015bvam\u0307 tyaktv\u0101 svapna vic\u0101ram || 24</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">Who are you? Who am I? From where do I come? Who is my mother, who is my father? Ponder thus, look at everything as essence-less and give up the world as an idle dream.</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u0924\u094d\u0935\u092f\u093f \u092e\u092f\u093f \u091a\u093e\u0928\u094d\u092f\u0924\u094d\u0930\u0948\u0915\u094b \u0935\u093f\u0937\u094d\u0923\u0941\u0903<br />\u0935\u094d\u092f\u0930\u094d\u0925\u0902 \u0915\u0941\u092a\u094d\u092f\u0938\u093f \u092e\u092f\u094d\u092f\u0938\u0939\u093f\u0937\u094d\u0923\u0941\u0903 .<br />\u092d\u0935 \u0938\u092e\u091a\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0924\u0903 \u0938\u0930\u094d\u0935\u0924\u094d\u0930 \u0924\u094d\u0935\u0902<br />\u0935\u093e\u091e\u094d\u091b\u0938\u094d\u092f\u091a\u093f\u0930\u093e\u0926\u094d\u092f\u0926\u093f \u0935\u093f\u0937\u094d\u0923\u0941\u0924\u094d\u0935\u092e\u094d .. \u0968\u096b..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 25</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\ntvayi mayi c\u0101nyatraiko vis\u0323n\u0323uh\u0323<br />\nvyartham\u0307 kupyasi mayyasahis\u0323n\u0323uh\u0323 |<br />\nbhava samacittah\u0323 sarvatra tvam\u0307<br />\nv\u0101\u00f1chasyacir\u0101dyadi vis\u0323n\u0323utvam || 25</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">In me, in you and in everything, none but the same Vishnu dwells. Your anger and impatience is meaningless. If you wish to attain the quality of Vishnu soon, have Sama Bhaava always.</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u0936\u0924\u094d\u0930\u094c \u092e\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0930\u0947 \u092a\u0941\u0924\u094d\u0930\u0947 \u092c\u0928\u094d\u0927\u094c<br />\u092e\u093e \u0915\u0941\u0930\u0941 \u092f\u0924\u094d\u0928\u0902 \u0935\u093f\u0917\u094d\u0930\u0939\u0938\u0928\u094d\u0927\u094c .<br />\u0938\u0930\u094d\u0935\u0938\u094d\u092e\u093f\u0928\u094d\u0928\u092a\u093f \u092a\u0936\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0924\u094d\u092e\u093e\u0928\u0902<br />\u0938\u0930\u094d\u0935\u0924\u094d\u0930\u094b\u0924\u094d\u0938\u0943\u091c \u092d\u0947\u0926\u093e\u091c\u094d\u091e\u093e\u0928\u092e\u094d .. \u0968\u096c..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 26</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\n\u015batrau mitre putre bandhau<br />\nm\u0101 kuru yatnam\u0307 vigrahasandhau |<br />\nsarvasminnapi pa\u015by\u0101tm\u0101nam\u0307<br />\nsarvatrotsr\u0323ja bhed\u0101j\u00f1\u0101nam || 26</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">Do not waste your efforts to win the love of or to fight against friend and foe, children and relatives. See yourself in everyone and give up all feelings of duality completely.</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u0915\u093e\u092e\u0902 \u0915\u094d\u0930\u094b\u0927\u0902 \u0932\u094b\u092d\u0902 \u092e\u094b\u0939\u0902<br />\u0924\u094d\u092f\u0915\u094d\u0924\u094d\u0935\u093e\u093d\u0924\u094d\u092e\u093e\u0928\u0902 \u092d\u093e\u0935\u092f \u0915\u094b\u093d\u0939\u092e\u094d .<br />\u0906\u0924\u094d\u092e\u091c\u094d\u091e\u093e\u0928 \u0935\u093f\u0939\u0940\u0928\u093e \u092e\u0942\u0922\u093e\u0903<br />\u0924\u0947 \u092a\u091a\u094d\u092f\u0928\u094d\u0924\u0947 \u0928\u0930\u0915\u0928\u093f\u0917\u0942\u0922\u093e\u0903 .. \u0968\u096d..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 27</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\nk\u0101mam\u0307 krodham\u0307 lobham\u0307 moham\u0307<br />\ntyaktv\u0101'tm\u0101nam\u0307 bh\u0101vaya ko'ham |<br />\n\u0101tmaj\u00f1\u0101na vih\u012bn\u0101 m\u016bd\u0323h\u0101h\u0323<br />\nte pacyante narakanig\u016bd\u0323h\u0101h\u0323 || 27</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">Give up lust, anger, infatuation, and greed. Ponder over your real nature. Fools are they who are blind to the Self. Cast into hell they suffer there endlessly.</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u0917\u0947\u092f\u0902 \u0917\u0940\u0924\u093e \u0928\u093e\u092e \u0938\u0939\u0938\u094d\u0930\u0902<br />\u0927\u094d\u092f\u0947\u092f\u0902 \u0936\u094d\u0930\u0940\u092a\u0924\u093f \u0930\u0942\u092a\u092e\u091c\u0938\u094d\u0930\u092e\u094d .<br />\u0928\u0947\u092f\u0902 \u0938\u091c\u094d\u091c\u0928 \u0938\u0919\u094d\u0917\u0947 \u091a\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0924\u0902<br />\u0926\u0947\u092f\u0902 \u0926\u0940\u0928\u091c\u0928\u093e\u092f \u091a \u0935\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0924\u092e\u094d .. \u0968\u096e..</span></td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 28</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\ngeyam\u0307 g\u012bt\u0101 n\u0101ma sahasram\u0307<br />\ndhyeyam\u0307 \u015br\u012bpati r\u016bpamajasram |<br />\nneyam\u0307 sajjana san\u0323ge cittam\u0307<br />\ndeyam\u0307 d\u012bnajan\u0101ya ca vittam || 28</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">Regularly recite from the Bhagavad-Gita, meditate on Vishnu in your heart, and chant His thousand glories. Take delight to be with the noble and the holy. Distribute your wealth in charity to the poor and the needy.</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u0938\u0941\u0916\u0924\u0903 \u0915\u094d\u0930\u093f\u092f\u0924\u0947 \u0930\u093e\u092e\u093e\u092d\u094b\u0917\u0903<br />\u092a\u0936\u094d\u091a\u093e\u0926\u094d\u0927\u0928\u094d\u0924 \u0936\u0930\u0940\u0930\u0947 \u0930\u094b\u0917\u0903 .<br />\u092f\u0926\u094d\u092f\u092a\u093f \u0932\u094b\u0915\u0947 \u092e\u0930\u0923\u0902 \u0936\u0930\u0923\u0902<br />\u0924\u0926\u092a\u093f \u0928 \u092e\u0941\u091e\u094d\u091a\u0924\u093f \u092a\u093e\u092a\u093e\u091a\u0930\u0923\u092e\u094d .. \u0968\u096f..</span></td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 29</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\n<br />\nsukhatah\u0323 kriyate r\u0101m\u0101bhogah\u0323<br />\npa\u015bc\u0101ddhanta \u015bar\u012bre rogah\u0323 |<br />\nyadyapi loke maran\u0323am\u0307 \u015baran\u0323am\u0307<br />\ntadapi na mu\u00f1cati p\u0101p\u0101caran\u0323am || 29</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">He who yields to lust for pleasure leaves his body a prey to disease. Though death brings an end to everything, man does not give up the sinful path.</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u0905\u0930\u094d\u0925\u092e\u0928\u0930\u094d\u0925\u0902 \u092d\u093e\u0935\u092f \u0928\u093f\u0924\u094d\u092f\u0902<br />\u0928\u093e\u0938\u094d\u0924\u093f\u0924\u0924\u0903 \u0938\u0941\u0916\u0932\u0947\u0936\u0903 \u0938\u0924\u094d\u092f\u092e\u094d .<br />\u092a\u0941\u0924\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0926\u092a\u093f \u0927\u0928 \u092d\u093e\u091c\u093e\u0902 \u092d\u0940\u0924\u093f\u0903<br />\u0938\u0930\u094d\u0935\u0924\u094d\u0930\u0948\u0937\u093e \u0935\u093f\u0939\u093f\u0906 \u0930\u0940\u0924\u093f\u0903 .. \u0969\u0966..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 30</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\narthamanartham\u0307 bh\u0101vaya nityam\u0307<br />\nn\u0101stitatah\u0323 sukhale\u015bah\u0323 satyam |<br />\nputr\u0101dapi dhana bh\u0101j\u0101m\u0307 bh\u012btih\u0323<br />\nsarvatrais\u0323\u0101 vihi\u0101 r\u012btih\u0323 || 30</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">Wealth is not welfare, truly there is no joy in it. Reflect thus at all times. A rich man fears even his own son. This is the way of wealth everywhere.</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u092a\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0923\u093e\u092f\u093e\u092e\u0902 \u092a\u094d\u0930\u0924\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0939\u093e\u0930\u0902<br />\u0928\u093f\u0924\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0928\u093f\u0924\u094d\u092f \u0935\u093f\u0935\u0947\u0915\u0935\u093f\u091a\u093e\u0930\u092e\u094d .<br />\u091c\u093e\u092a\u094d\u092f\u0938\u092e\u0947\u0924 \u0938\u092e\u093e\u0927\u093f\u0935\u093f\u0927\u093e\u0928\u0902<br />\u0915\u0941\u0930\u094d\u0935\u0935\u0927\u093e\u0928\u0902 \u092e\u0939\u0926\u0935\u0927\u093e\u0928\u092e\u094d .. \u0969\u0967..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 31</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\npr\u0101n\u0323\u0101y\u0101mam\u0307 praty\u0101h\u0101ram\u0307<br />\nnity\u0101nitya vivekavic\u0101ram |<br />\nj\u0101pyasameta sam\u0101dhividh\u0101nam\u0307<br />\nkurvavadh\u0101nam\u0307 mahadavadh\u0101nam || 31</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">Regulate the pranas (life airs within), remain unaffected by external influences and discriminate between the real and the fleeting. Chant the holy name of God and silence the turbulent mind. Perform these with care, with extreme care.</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u0917\u0941\u0930\u0941\u091a\u0930\u0923\u093e\u092e\u094d\u092c\u0941\u091c \u0928\u093f\u0930\u094d\u092d\u0930 \u092d\u0915\u0924\u0903<br />\u0938\u0902\u0938\u093e\u0930\u093e\u0926\u091a\u093f\u0930\u093e\u0926\u094d\u092d\u0935 \u092e\u0941\u0915\u094d\u0924\u0903 .<br />\u0938\u0947\u0928\u094d\u0926\u094d\u0930\u093f\u092f\u092e\u093e\u0928\u0938 \u0928\u093f\u092f\u092e\u093e\u0926\u0947\u0935\u0902<br />\u0926\u094d\u0930\u0915\u094d\u0937\u094d\u092f\u0938\u093f \u0928\u093f\u091c \u0939\u0943\u0926\u092f\u0938\u094d\u0925\u0902 \u0926\u0947\u0935\u092e\u094d .. \u0969\u0968..</span></td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 32</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\ngurucaran\u0323\u0101mbuja nirbhara bhakatah\u0323<br />\nsam\u0307s\u0101r\u0101dacir\u0101dbhava muktah\u0323 |<br />\nsendriyam\u0101nasa niyam\u0101devam\u0307<br />\ndrak\u015byasi nija hr\u0323dayastham\u0307 devam || 32</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">Oh devotee of the lotus feet of the Guru! May thou be soon free from Samsara. Through disciplined senses and controlled mind, thou shalt come to experience the indwelling Lord of your heart!</span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"318\"><div align=\"left\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u092e\u0942\u0922\u0903 \u0915\u0936\u094d\u091a\u0928 \u0935\u0948\u092f\u093e\u0915\u0930\u0923\u094b<br />\u0921\u0941\u0915\u0943\u091e\u094d\u0915\u0930\u0923\u093e\u0927\u094d\u092f\u092f\u0928 \u0927\u0941\u0930\u093f\u0923\u0903 .<br />\u0936\u094d\u0930\u0940\u092e\u091a\u094d\u091b\u092e\u094d\u0915\u0930 \u092d\u0917\u0935\u091a\u094d\u091b\u093f\u0937\u094d\u092f\u0948<br />\u092c\u094b\u0927\u093f\u0924 \u0906\u0938\u093f\u091a\u094d\u091b\u094b\u0927\u093f\u0924\u0915\u0930\u0923\u0903 .. \u0969\u0969..</span></div>\n</td><td width=\"216\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 33</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"56\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\nm\u016bd\u0323hah\u0323 ka\u015bcana vaiy\u0101karan\u0323o<br />\nd\u0323ukr\u0323\u00f1karan\u0323\u0101dhyayana dhurin\u0323ah\u0323 |<br />\n\u015br\u012bmacchamkara bhagavacchis\u0323yai<br />\nbodhita \u0101sicchodhitakaran\u0323ah\u0323 || 33</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><span style=\"color: #0000cc;\"><br /><span style=\"color: #000099;\">Thus was a silly grammarian lost in rules cleansed of his narrow vision and shown the Light by Shankara's apostles.</span></span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<br style=\"font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; text-align: justify;\" />\n<br />\n<table align=\"center\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"color: black; font-family: Tahoma, 'Tahoma Plus', 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify; width: 603px;\"><tbody>\n<tr><td rowspan=\"2\" width=\"331\"><span style=\"font-size: medium;\">\u092d\u091c\u0917\u094b\u0935\u093f\u0928\u094d\u0926\u0902 \u092d\u091c\u0917\u094b\u0935\u093f\u0928\u094d\u0926\u0902<br />\u0917\u094b\u0935\u093f\u0928\u094d\u0926\u0902 \u092d\u091c\u092e\u0942\u0922\u092e\u0924\u0947 .<br />\u0928\u093e\u092e\u0938\u094d\u092e\u0930\u0923\u093e\u0926\u0928\u094d\u092f\u092e\u0941\u092a\u093e\u092f\u0902<br />\u0928\u0939\u093f \u092a\u0936\u094d\u092f\u093e\u092e\u094b \u092d\u0935\u0924\u0930\u0923\u0947 .. \u0969\u096a..</span></td><td width=\"214\"><div align=\"center\">\n<b>Text 34</b></div>\n</td><td width=\"58\"></td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"2\"><div align=\"left\">\nbhajagovindam\u0307 bhajagovindam\u0307<br />\ngovindam\u0307 bhajam\u016bd\u0323hamate |<br />\nn\u0101masmaran\u0323\u0101danyamup\u0101yam\u0307<br />\nnahi pa\u015by\u0101mo bhavataran\u0323e || 34</div>\n</td></tr>\n<tr><td colspan=\"3\"><div align=\"left\">\n<img src=\"http://www.harekrsna.de/artikel/spacer.gif\" height=\"9\" width=\"8\" /><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\">Worship Govinda, worship Govinda, worship Govinda, Oh fool! Other than chanting the Lord's names, there is no other way to cross the life's ocean.</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: #000099;\"><br /></span></div>\n</td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There were 14 disciples\nalong with Adi Shankaracharya when the incident which prompted these verses too\nplace at Varanasi. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adi Shankaracharya said\nthat this world is just an illusion ( Maya ) and not a reality. &nbsp;Today we know that our 5 senses are too narrow\nand squelched and the spectrum is too wide. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BrahmAn , the supreme\nmorphogenetic consciousness field alone is real, eternal and, being the ground\nof the world, yet transcends it, while this world is transient and changing . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only by following the\nlaws of the universe ( to reduce Karmic baggage ) shedding ego and surrender to\ngod can one get rid of this endless cycle of births and deaths ( Moksha ). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bad qualities like\nlust, anger, greed, attachment and egotism prevents self-realization. &nbsp;Shankara asks, \"What then is the use of\nhuman life if one never tries to realize one\u2019s true nature?\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A man who has attained\nMokhsha while still living ( Jivan Mukth ) is enlightened and his sense of finitude\nis removed. &nbsp;He realizes \u2018Aham Brahmasmi\u2019\n\u2013 I am Brahman, \u2018Tattvamasi\u2019 \u2013 You are Brahman, and &nbsp;Sarvam Khalvidam Brahma\u2019 \u2013 Everything is &nbsp;Brahman. &nbsp;&nbsp;Namaste\nis about bowing to the brahmAn in you\u2014which resides in the DNA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When one attains this\nstage, jiva never identifies itself either with the three states of matter\n(<i>Jaagrith, Swapna, Sushupthi </i>of OM symbol ) or with the panchakoshas. <span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;</span>One\nrealizes that it is above all these and transcends everything. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">MOKSHA , THE FINAL STOP\nTO ENDLESS CYCLE OF EARTHLY SOJOURNS VADAKAYIL.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SE-xssFHFLU/UungIRM8u_I/AAAAAAAApVc/DKffi3Mh2n0/s1600/imagesCAWL6LND.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SE-xssFHFLU/UungIRM8u_I/AAAAAAAApVc/DKffi3Mh2n0/s1600/imagesCAWL6LND.jpg\" width=\"309\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">OM is the four states\nof consciousness, as per Patanjali Yoga.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">OM is the waking state\nor jagrat. Beta brain wave<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">OM is the dreaming\nstate or svapna.&nbsp; REM sleep state<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">OM is the deep sleep\nstate or sushupti. (dream-less deep sleep state , the delta brain wave)<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Om is the\ntranscendental state or turiya. (beyond all the states) , the fourth has been\ncalled nirvana.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Sagnik D<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">December 13, 2017 at 11:59 AM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">From reading so many of your blogs I just realized that in Kaliyuga we are obsessed with using our brain to create tools through technology to do things for us. But we (our brain and body) are actually the most advanced tool that is underutilized. In the past with better DNA and being in touch with nature we were able to do amazing things. Even if there are black sheep, will he write a verse deriding all sadhus?<br />\n<br />\nAgain in Hanuman Chalisa - even when reading it aloud, I could not get myself to say these lines -<br />\n<br />\n\u0914\u0930 \u0926\u0947\u0935\u0924\u093e \u091a\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0924 \u0928 \u0927\u0930\u0908 \u0964<br />\n\u0939\u0928\u0941\u092e\u0924 \u0938\u0947\u0907 \u0938\u0930\u094d\u092c \u0938\u0941\u0916 \u0915\u0930\u0908 \u0965\u0969\u096b\u0965<br />\n<br />\nI will not keep any other God in my heart, except Hanuman.<br />\nSo I will not even remember Ram/Vishnu (even though Hanuman himself worships Ram)?<br />\n<br />\nThis never felt right.<br />\n<br />\nAs soon as Ajit ji wrote this, it was a Eureka moment.<br />\n<br />\nMany thanks, Ajit ji.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n\u2022&nbsp; <br />\nCapt. &nbsp;THE WRITTEN VEDAS WERE IN THE CUSTODY ON KERALA NAMBOODIRIS AT THE BANKS OF THE RIVER SARASWATI..<br />\n<br />\nNOW LISTEN\u2014THIS IS THE MOST CRITICAL PART OF THIS COMMENT\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIN 4000 BC ,RIVER SARASWATI DRIED UP DUE TO A TECTONIC SHIFT AT THE GLACIAL MOUTH IN THE HIMALAYAS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE BROTHER OF KRISHNA BALARAMA TOOK HIS GIGANTIC PLOW ( FOR LEVERAGE ) AND SHIFTED THE SARSWATI WATERS TO GANGA AND YAMUNA \u2013LEAVING ONLY THE UNDERGROUND SARASWATI RIVER FLOWING..<br />\n<br />\nBALARAMA WOULD WITNESS THE FINAL BATTLE BETWEEN DURYODHANA AND BHIMA IN A STAGNANT POOL OF SARSWATI RIVER IN 4000 BC ..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">BEFORE THE KURUKSHETRA WAS COULD START , VISHNU TOOK AN AVATAR AS PARASHURAMA TO KEEP THE 4 VEDAS AND 108 UPANISHADS SAFE\u2026&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nPARASHURAMA LEAD THE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS BACK HOME FROM SARSWATI RIVER BANKS WITH THE VEDAS AND UPANISHADS .. AND PRETTY SOON OUR TEMPLES HAD ONLY HOMOSEXUALS AS PUJARIS-.. The celibate transforms the energy of reproduction into spiritual energy (ojas), bringing in lustre.<br />\n<br />\nThe word \u2018virya\u2019 mentioned means power of knowledge or action, vigor in body\u2019s organs and the mind, spiritual power or the attainment of siddhis.<br />\n<br />\nBrahmacharya is about allocation: using your resources effectively to achieve your aspiration.Brahmacharya means not misusing sex. Brahmacharya means \u2018to respect the creative power of sex and not abuse it by manipulating others sexually.<br />\n<br />\nThe sex you have with your wife is LOVE. The sex you have with a whore is LUST.<br />\n<br />\nLike the other yamas, brahmacharya has to do with balance, and how we choose to use or \u201cinvest\u201d our resources. Each and every act and thought is an outflow of energy.<br />\n<br />\nBrahmacharya is about harnessing the energy or power of our senses and directing that instead to greater personal understanding- not withholding semen.<br />\n<br />\nWE ARE DONE WITH HOMOSEXUALITY SPREADING GURUS LIKE SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR AND SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV..<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD USED GANDHI TO SPEAD HIS BRAHMACHARI NONSENSE-- ALL THE WHILE GANDHI WAS SLEEPING NAKED WITH UNDERAGE GIRLS.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/01/mahatma-gandhi-and-his-endless.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe technical meaning of Brahmacharya is self-restraint, particularly mastery of perfect control over the senses- not the PRICK or DICK or LODA alone.</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Brahmacharya is the virtue of celibacy when unmarried and fidelity when married..</span></div>\n<br />\nBrahmacharya is a means, not an end. It usually includes cleanliness, ahimsa, simple living, studies, meditation, and voluntary restraints on certain foods, intoxicants, and behaviors-(including sexual behavior).<br />\nTHIS BLOGSITE AND WE THE PEOPLE HAVE 100% SYMPATHY FOR TRENSGENDERS ( HIJRAS )\u2026BUT WE HAVE NO SYMPATHY FOR GAYS AND LESBIANS WHO ARE 99% PEDOPHILES..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">IT IS A CRIME TO CLUB TRANSGENDERS WITH GAY AND LESBIAN PERVERTS \u2026</span></b><br />\nOnce a train ticket inspector tried to harass one of my wife\u2019s relatives who was travelling alone at night\u2026 She had the ticket but was in the wrong railway line\u2026 ( this had happened to me and I know ) Three hijras piled on to him so badly that the fellow had to run away at the next station.. These hijras then escorted the woman till her home front door..and they expected nothing in return..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_148b+seedaHXD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_148b+seedaHXD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4184446395271055880\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative; text-align: left;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_78M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. WE NEVER HEARD OF CHITRAGUPTA ( AND MISSING LINK KAYASTHAS ) TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nIN SANATANA DHARMA HEAVEN IS THE SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER ( BRAHMAN THE FIELD ) WHO SHEARED OFF A SMALL BIT OF HIS BODY AND SEND YOU AS A SOUL ( BALL OF ENERGY ) AT ITS LOWEST FREQUENCY TO GAIN LIFE EXPERIENCE..<br />\n<br />\nYOU ( YOUR SOUL EVOLVED ) FROM BACTERIA, TO BIRD, TO ANIMAL TO HUMAN WITH LOW FREQUENCY SOULD TO MOKSHA SOUL OF HIGHEST FREQUENCY , SAME AS BRAHMAN --AFTER WHICH YOUR SOUL MERGED BACK WITH MOTHER FIELD OF BRAHMAN TO SHARE LIFE EXPERIENCES WITH ITS MOTHER ..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE FEED BACK STOPS IN THIS CLOSED LOOP --PRALAYA ( DISSOLUTION ) HAPPENS ..<br />\n<br />\nFIRST ASTRAL LATER IS MEANT FOR ALL SPECIES OF LIVES --EXCEPT HUMAN .. THE SOULS OF CRIMINALS/ HOMOSEXUALS WHO HAVE NO CONSCIENCE ARE IN THE LAYER..<br />\n<br />\nSECOND TO SIXTH LAYERS ARE MEANT ONLY FOR CONSCIOUS HUMANS..<br />\n<br />\nTHE SECOND ASTRAL LAYER MEANT FOR SOULS WITH LOWEST FREQUENCY ( HIGH NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE ) AND THE SIXTH ASTRAL HAVING PARKING SPACE FOR SOULS OF HIGHER FREQUENCY ( LOW NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE ).<br />\n<br />\nYAMA IS IN CHARGE OF LAYERS TWO TO SIX..<br />\n<br />\nALL SOULS IN FIRST TO SIXTH ASTRAL LAYERS --AWAIT RE-BIRTH.<br />\n<br />\nSEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER IS THE FIELD OF BRAHMAN ( VAIKUNTA ).. HERE ONLY MOKSHA SOULS -- NIL EGO, NIL KRAMIC BAGGAGE AND HIGHEST SOULD FREQUENCY ( SAME AS MOTHER FIELD BRAHMAN ) CAN ENTER --TO BE MERGED WITH BRAHMAN ( GOD )..<br />\n<br />\nONLY SOULS CAN ENTER ALL SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS --NOT THE PHYSICAL BODY ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE RASCAL SADUGU JAGGI VASUDEV LIES ABOUT PLENTY FOOD TO EAT AND APSARAS FOR SEX IN SEVENTH LAYER .. BALLS !<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE 5 PANDAVA BROTHERS AND DRAUPADI DECIDE TO CLIMB MOUNT MERU --IT IS AN ALLEGORY FOR DEATH AND SOULS PARKING AT ONE OF THE SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS<br />\n<br />\nYAMA ( DHARMA ) IN THE FORM OF A DOG JOINS THIS GROUP ..<br />\n<br />\nYAMA USHERS IN --<br />\nDRAUPADI INTO THE SECOND ASTRAL LAYER<br />\nNAKULA INTO THE THIRD ASTRAL LAYER<br />\nSAHADEVA INTO THE FOURTH ASTRAL LAYER<br />\nBHIMA INTO THE FIFTH ASTRAL LAYER<br />\nARJUNA INTO THE SIXTH ASTRAL LAYER<br />\n<br />\nAND THEN YUDHISTRA LOOKS BACK AND SEES THE DOG.. HE KNOWS THAT NO DOG CAN GET PAST THE FIRST ASTRAL LAYER --AND HE IS PUZZLED..<br />\n<br />\nAT THE SEVENT ASTRAL LAYER ( EQUIVALENT OF HEAVEN ) YUDDHISTRA SEES ALL HUNDRED KAURAVAS ALREADY THERE -- ALONG WITH THE STALWARTS LIKE BHISHMA/ DRONA /KARNA ETC<br />\n<br />\nHE IS SHOCKED AND ANGRY<br />\n<br />\nAT THAT TIME YAMA ( THE DOORKEEPER OF ASTRAL LAYERS 2 TO 6 ) DECLARES THAT HE IS YUDDHISTRAs FATHER WITH KUNTI .. AND THAT YUDDHISTRA STILL HAS SEEDS OF EGO WITHIN HIMS WHICH MAKES HIM UNFIT FOR MOKSHA ..<br />\n<br />\nYAMAs EXPLANATION: WHOEVER KRISHNA KILLED --ALL GOT MOKSHA .. They are indeed the same, just as musk and its scent are inseparable, or as fire and its heat are nondifferent. Thus Radha and Lord Krsna are one, yet They have taken two forms to enjoy the mellows of pastimes. (Cc. (taste),</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ngu\u1e47a (properties),</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nv\u012brya (potency),</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nvip\u0101ka (rasa IF YOU FIND ANY LITERATURE THAT A MAHARISHI WAS UNMARRIED , IT IS POISON INJECTED.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THERE IS NO PLACE FOR HOMOSEXUALS IN THE SPIRITUAL LIFE OF SANATANA DHARMA .</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIN ANCIENT INDIAN LITERATURE YOU DO NOT FIND ANY MENTION OF HOMOSEXUALS , DUE TO OUR Y CHROMOSOME PRESERVING GOTRA SYSTEM</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBARREN WOMEN AND UNMARRIED CHILDLESS MEN DO NOT MAKE GOOD RULERS OR SPIRITUAL LEADERS \u2014AS PER SANATANA DHARMA.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nSanatana Dharma gives utmost importance to GRIHASTA stage .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nSanatana Dharma has recognized the psychological problems associated with barren women/ unmarried men ruling a kingdom or being spiritual leaders. It is about a personal stake in the future of the watan and the planet.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_56BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_23.html?showComment=1529848590537#c884639508971628010\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 24, 2018 at 7:26 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_54MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nA major portion of DHARMA is carried out in the Grihasta stage -- where you are creative and do your DUTY for good of society and nation ( age 25 to age 50 ). This is the period when a man demonstrates SELF RESTRAINT .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWhen the scriptural studies appropriate to the student have been completed, and he has received blessings of his Guru, let him enter into the order of the Grihastha (householder). Let him pursue and obtain, by ethical ways, home, wife, children and wealth, discharge to the best of his ability the duties of his life's stage.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n\u2014\u2009Vishnu Purana, 3.IX.1 - 3.IX.31 5000 BC</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIT IS THE LYING WHITE INVADER WHO MADE PRESERVATION OF SEMEN , AND BEING UNMARRIED AS A GREAT QUALIFICATION IN HINDUISM \u2013 SANATANA DHARMA BANS IT . .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIN GRIHASTA STAGE THE MAN IS NOT ALLOWED TO HAVE SEX WITH ANY WOMAN WHO COMES HIS WAY , LIKE HOW THE NAMBOODIRIS DID IN KERALA ( SAMBANDHAM ) .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHE CAN HAVE SEX ONLY WITH HIS WIFE AND CONTINUING HIS LINEAGE IS PART OF HIS DHARMA .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe 7000 year old Vedas lay down that dharma performed by a man alone without his wife is no dharma and will yield no fruit whatsoever. Such is the paramount nature of Grihasta ashrama.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe Vedas hold marriage to be one of the important sacraments sanctifying the body. That is why; marriage is given great importance by the Hindus.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIt is said, \u201cThat man who does not win a wife is really half, and he is not the full man as long as he does not beget an offspring.\u201d A wife is also hailed as\u201d the very source of the Purusharthas, not Only of Dharma, Artha and Kama but even of Moksha.\u2019</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nEvery Hindu god had his wife almost as a part of him, not as a shadow.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nShiva is powerless without Shakti.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMarriage in Sanatana Dharma is NOT for sexual pleasure.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nEvery Hindus man is compulsorily expected to undergo the \u201cvivaha samskara\u201d and run a family (kutumba). Never mind what FREEMASON and Jew Rothschild\u2019s UNMARRIED Vivekananda said .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">Vedas ordain that dharma must be practiced by man together with his wife.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn Sanatana Dharma, marriage is a religious duty, and not a civil contract. It is regarded as one of the most sacred of the sacraments symbolizing the holy and indissoluble union of a couple who thereafter are mutually dependent and indispensable in the performance of religious duties.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nProgeny instrumental to cementing a relationship and for bliss.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: medium;\"><b>Manu Smriti clearly states that \u201che is a perfect man, who consists of his wife, himself and his offspring.\u201d</b></span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nVedas have enjoined that dharma must be observed by man together with his wife. No yagna performed or pilgrimages undertaken will have any effect, if the wife is not a partner in those holy duties during the grihasta and vanaprasta ashramas. During Sanyasa the man can go for pilgrimage on his own.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe early shastras permit unmarried girls to take the whole responsibility upon themselves of choosing their life-mates and enter into wedlock with them. They need to wait for three years only after puberty for some responsible elder to arrange for their marriage, but no more.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn Sanatana Dharma marriages are made in heaven , NOT by LIVING IN TOGETHER ( like in the west ) and examining if the wife can indeed give him a good blow job whenever he wants it\u2014</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n--or vice versa--</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nif the husband can use his tongue power on her fungi affected , smelling like putrid fish part whenever she wishes .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMy own marriage was arranged.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMy elder son\u2019s marriage was arranged</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIN OUR FAMILY THERE HAS NEVER EVER BEEN CAESARIAN BIRTHS \u2013THOUGH INDIA WAS THE FIRST TO DO THIS SURGICAL PROCEDURE.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIT WAS ROTHSCHILD MEDIA AND HISTORIANS WHO GAVE UNWARRANTED PROPAGANDA FOR UNMARRIED HINDU GURUS ( I AM SURE YOU KNOW WHO THEY ARE ) .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nA LOT OF THESE UNMARRIED FAKE GURUS WERE CRYPTO JEW HOMOSEXUALS - -- OR JUST FAKE AND BACKDATED CREATIONS OF THE WHITE INVADER - THEY ARE HEROES IN YOUR NCERT TEXT BOOKS .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIt is the white invader who wrote lies that Hindus ill treat women and suppress them. Do we have any reference from scriptures where Tara (wife of deceased Vali), Mandodari (the wife of deceased Ravana), Uttara (the wife of deceased Abhimanyu) shaving their heads , wearing white sarees and living in seclusion?</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n..</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_56b+seedBDGkD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2141837686331207768\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_35M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. THESE VERSES ARE NOT WRITTEN BY MAN.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE SUN CANNOT BE SEEN FROM OUTER SPACE ..BUT ITS ENERGY CAN\nBE DRAWN BY SOLAR PANELS OF SATELLITES.. THIS IS AN EXAMPLE OF MAYA MENTIONED\nIN RIG VEDA 72 TIMES AND 29 TIMES IN ATHARVA VEDA .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMAYA IS INVISIBLE- NO HUMAN CAN SEE BEYOND THE QUANTUM\nSCREEN.. /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nVISHNU IS A TRANSFORMER -- THOUGH I HAVE MENTIONED THAT\nVISHNU IS A MEDIATOR AND PRESERVER IN ALL MY POSTS SO FAR.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div VISHNU.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL HINDU GODS ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES , EXCEPT VISHNUs MORTAL\nAVATARS VAMAMA, PARASHURAMA, RAMA, KRISHNA AVATARS..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU LOOK INTO THE MIRROR WHAT YOU SEE IS NOT YOU-- YOU\nARE ACTUALLY A BALL OF VIBRATING ENERGY INSIDE YOUR BODY..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU DIE YOUR SOUL WILL EXIT YOUR BODY..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN THE BODY IS CREMATED AND THE SKULL POPS A SOLITON WAVE\n( TSUNAMI ) WILL TAKE YOUR SOUL UP TO ONE OF THE SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS WHICH\nACCOMMODATES THAT PARTICULAR SOUL FREQUENCY.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU BURY A DEAD BODY , THE SOUL IS TRAPPED ON PLANET\nEARTH, UNHAPPY AND LOST FOREVER. SINCE BURIAL RELIGIONS CAME ON PLANET EARTH\nMAN HAS KNOWN NO PEACE..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOUR SOUL FREQUENCY IS TIED TO YOUR NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE.\nWHEN THE KARMIC BAGGAGE GETS LIGHTER , YOUR SOUL FREQUENCY INCREASES..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS CORRESPOND TO THE SEVEN HUMAN\nCHAKRAS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHERE IS NO INSTANT KUNDALINI BUNGEE JUMP..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE FIRST ASTRA LAYER IS FOR NON \u2013 CONSCIOUS FORMS OF LIFE ,\nFEW SEMI-CONSCIOUS FORMS OF LIFE WHICH CAN PASS THE MIRROR/ COLOUR TEST ( LIKE\nELEPHANTS/ BONOBOS/ DOLPHINS ) , AND FULLY CONSCIOUS HUMANS WHO ARE CRIMINALS\nAND HOMSEXUALS WHOSE KUNDALINIS ARE STUCK IN THE LOWERMOST MOOLADHARA CHAKRA.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCHAKRAS AND ASRAL LAYERS RISE FROM RED TO VIOLET ( RAINBOW\nVIBGYOR COLORS ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. MAN IS JUST A CHANNEL.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE AIM OF A HINDU IS LIBERATION FROM ENDLESS REBIRTHS-- SO\nTHAT HIS SOUL CAN GO HOME AND MERGE WITH THE FIELD OF BRAHMAN...<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMOKSHA CAN HAPPEN ONLY WHEN THE SOUL FREQUENCY AND FREQUENCY\nOF THE MOTHER FIELD BRAHMAN ( MORPHOGENETIC CONSCIOUSNESS FIELD \u2013SEVENTH ASTRAL\nLAYER ) IS THE SAME.. A\nHINDU CULTIVATES SHRADDHA --NOT BHAKTI UNLIKE SINGLE MESSIAH / SINGLE HOLY BOOK\nRELIGIONS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSHRADDHA IS A POSTIVE ENERGY EMANATING FROM WITHIN WHICH\nFACTORS IN HUMAN CONSCIENCE.. THERE CANNOT BE SINGLE HOLY BOOK DOGMA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSHRADDHA CANNOT BE BLIND FAITH, IT IS ENLIGHTENED FAITH\u2014\nSELF VERIFICATION IS INVOLVED IN EVERY INCH OF YOUR SPRIRITUAL PROGRESS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSHRADDHA IMPIES SELF RELIANCE , AN INDEPENDENT SENSE OF\nRIGHT OR WRONG , RELIANCE ON OWN CONSCIENCE AND COURGAGE OF ONEs SOUL\nCONVICTIONS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS IS WHY HINDUS CAN NEVER RUSH OUT OF TEMPLES ENMASSE\nAFTER FRIDAY NOON PRAYERS AND START KILLING PEOPLE OF OTHER RELIGIONS ENMASSE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nONLY SANATANA DHARMA AFFORDS THIS UNBRIDLED FREEDOM.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nA HINDU DOES NOT NEED TO BE SAVES BY ANY MESSIAH..
