Tamas creates Rajas, and Rajas activates/ excites\nTamas. Sattva preserves and mediates .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n7000 year old Vedas say that the only constant in the cosmos\nis change, everything is in a state of flux, nothing is static-- everything is\nvibratory. This is what guarantees growth and evolution. It is a cosmic\nspiraling dance of separate opposing forces, which sustains this universe<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nOne cannot exist without the other and they are dependant .\nNo phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its opposite. They\nconsume each other yet support each other.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIf the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost by the\nmediator ( Vishnu ) , the universe will spiral out of control and end. This is\nwhy Lord Vishnu is called the PRESERVER god. And only Vishnu can have mortal\navatars.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAs for the opposing forces TAMAS/ RAJAS ( Brahma/ Shiva ) it\nreally does NOT matter as who is who, like in AC electricity-where you can plug\ninto the socket both ways.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThese two opposing forces are natural and transform each\nother , in perfect harmony. Harmony can never be stagnant . Lessening of Tamas\nalways results in increase of Rajas and vice versa.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBalance can never be permanent\u2014 Tamas and Rajas continiously\ndevour each other \u2013 and life flows on. This universe cannot exist without\nvibrations between two poles.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE THIRD TEMPLATE IS SAMKHYA<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 5-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. Ajit VadakayilAugust 13, 2018 at 7:48 AM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED FROM 4--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThis is about the male and female joint TEAM effort. This is\nNOT a dance of opposites. In Hinduism we call the MALE- purusha and FEMALE-\nprakriti.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIn the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as\nbeing created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are\npermanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal\naspects are called Shiva ( Purusha ) and Shakti (Prakriti ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nEach of the trinity gods are powerless without their\nconsorts.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPurusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the\nsame body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . It is a\nmindboggling, intelligent concept.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBoth Shiva and Shakti are Consciousness---- Shiva is the\nchangeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active\naspect of the same Consciousness.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThrough uniting with Purusha , Pragati gave form to his\nspirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS\nhere- not street side sex as figured out by small minds)<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWhen the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the\nsentient Purusha , the universe evolves.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPurusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle.\nPragati symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. The\nrelationship between say- Shakti and Shiva is the dance of consciousness and\nenergy<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPrakriti cannot be perceived, not because of its\nnon-existence, but because of its subtlety. It is perceived in its effects.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe eternal and indestructible union between Shiva and\nShakti gives birth to the whole Macrocosm, in its stable, static aspect as well\nas in its dynamic one. Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also\nthe agent of all change<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nShakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is\nwithdrawn into himself at the end of creation. This is for the perceptive.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nModern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy\nare interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSamkhya as you can see was a masterpiece of modeling the\nways of the inner universe.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe union of Shakti with Shiva by Kundalini rise is the\nliberation of seeker from the cycle of endless birth and death.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nDO YOU THINK IDIOTS LIKE SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR AND SADGURU\nJAGGI VASUDEV CAN EVER UNDERSTAND THIS\u2014THEIR PADMA VIBHUSHAN MINDS ARE TOO\nSMALL AND THINKING PROCESS TOO PETTY<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nREAD ALL 102 PARTS OF THE UNFINISHED POST BELOW-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n..<o:p></o:p><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; NOW, DEVI ( WIFE OF SHIVA ) IS ENERGY.. SHE IS NOT A MORTAL WOMAN..<br />\n<br />\nTHE SPOT ADI SHANKARACHARYA LOOKED BACK, DEVI DISAPPEARED AND HE CONSECRATED THE POWERFUL MOOKAMBIKA TEMPLE THERE ..<br />\n<br />\nTHOUGH THE TEMPLE IS IN KOLOOR KARNATAKA, ONLY MALAYALIS DEVOTEES GO THERE ..WE KNOW WHAT IT IS..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE ARE UNDERGROUND WATER CHANNELS FROM THE TOP OF KUDAJADRI MOUNTAIN TO THE INNER SANCTUM OF MOOKAMBIKA TEMPLE..<br />\n<br />\nDURING THESE RECENT FLOODS THE TEMPLE WAS PARTIALLY SUBERGED..<br />\n<br />\nSAME IN GIZA PYRAMIDS.. I HAD WRITTEN ABOUT THE APEX OF THE PYRAMID EMITTING A BLUE PLASMA GLOW WHICH COULD BE SEEN FOR THOUSANDS OF MILES IN ANCIENT TIMES .. THERE ARE WATER CHANNELS FROM THE RIVER NILE UNDER THE PYRAMIDS..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_34BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span kind=\"d\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_32B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1950966935418826789\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_32M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<span kind=\"d\"><cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. ( GEOMETRY OF OM -108), ULAM SPIRAL, LUCAS NUMBERS, PRIME NUMBER MAGIC , ISOTOPE MAGIC -- EMBEDDED IN IT.&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">THIS IS WHY WE SAY VEDAS WERE DOWNLOADED FROM AKASHA BY MAHARISHIS , AND THERE IS NO MORTAL AUTHOR..</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">BY RECITING VEDIC SRUTI EVERY HUMAN CONDITION OR COSMIC CONDITION COULD BE ADDRESSED AND RESOLVED INSTANTLY ..</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">SANATANA DHARMA IS BASED ON THE SCALAR LONGITUDINAL WAVE WHICH TRAVELS FASTER THAN LIGHT..</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">MY WIFE INTEGRATES ISOTOPE MAGIC ( SRUTI VERSES REDUCED TO DIGITS ) INTO HER DISTANT REIKI\u2014TACHYON ENERGY FASTER THAN LIGHT ..</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">MY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">59.20 %</span></b></span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">Capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\">..</span></div>\n</div>\n<span kind=\"d\">\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_32BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; THIS IS NOT PART OF SANATANA DHARMA..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD CREATED THESE RATHA YATRAS USING HIS FAKE MUTTS..<br />\n<br />\nTHE FAKE MUTTS CREATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD SPONSORED THE CASTE SYSTEM AND SUPPRESSION OF DALITS<br />\n<br />\nON THE RATHA YATRA DAY DALITS WERE ALLOWED TO SEE THE DEITY<br />\n<br />\nAND THEY WERE ALLOWED TO COOK PRASAD<br />\n<br />\nTHE SAME ONCE IN A YEAR THINGY WAS DONE AT KODUNGALLUR TEMPLE--WHERE THE WHITE INVADER IMPORTED DALIT TAMILS TO DESECRATE THE TEMPLE-- SHIT/ SEMEN/ BLOOD WAS THROWN ON THE DEITY WHILE SINGING XXX SEX SONGS<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/kodungallur-bharani-festival-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\nPURI RATH YATRA --<br />\n<br />\nlet me quote wikipedia-<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: Rasa Lila<br />\nDakshina Moda, marks the beginning of the three-day Rasa Lila of Jagannath.[12] Rasa lila is described in Hindu texts like the Bhagavata Purana and Gita Govinda as a night in Vrindavan when Krishna danced with his gopi-consort Radha and other gopis. The image of Jagannath is taken to the Rasa mandapa (a temple hall) of the Gundicha Temple where hymns from the Gita Govinda are sung for the last 3 days of his stay in the temple. During the Rasa Lila, the interaction between Jagannath-Krishna and the gopis is enacted through the Gita Govinda verses. In the olden days, Devadasis sang the verses, which are now sung by the temple servitors. Vaishnavas thus consider Gundicha Temple as Vrindavan during Jagannath's stay there.[13] UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nDEVADASIS, RADHA, JAYADEVA ARE ALL FAKE AND BACK DATED CREATIONS OF JEW ROTHSCHILD<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: when Jagannath (identified with the god Krishna) goes to stay for seven days in the Gundicha Temple, he intentionally leaves behind his consort Lakshmi locked up in a store room in the main Jagannath temple. While in the Gundicha temple, he is exclusively taken care by his gopis (cow-herding girls) led by his gopi-lover Radha like Krishna in Vrindavan. The gopis are symbolized by the temple devadasis on this occasion. When Jagannatha returns to his main temple after his amorous dalliance, Lakshmi meets him at the main temple gate and sprinkles some magical powder on him, which makes him forget about his escapade in the Gundicha Temple, and she is immediately reunited with her husband in blissful love.[18] UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: Lakshmi requests him to return home and Jagannath gives his consent by offering her agyan mala (a garland of consent), which the goddess accepts and takes with her while return to the main temple in the evening. Before returning to the temple, to vent her anger at being left out of the vacation, Lakshmi orders one of her attendants to damage a part of Jagannath's chariot, the Nandighosha. This ritual is known as the Ratha Bhanga (the breaking of the chariot).[10][11] This is followed by her hiding behind a tamarind tree outside the Gundicha Temple. After some time, she escapes to her home temple in secrecy, through a separate path way known as Hera Gohri Lane, as she fears the repercussions of her angry act.[10][11]UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.html<br />\n<br />\nLAKSHMI IS A COSMIC ALLEGORY<br />\n<br />\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gundicha_Temple<br />\n<br />\nAT EVERY LITERARY FEST THE DROHI BASTARDS COOK UP MORE AND MORE IMMORAL STORIES-- HOW A HINDU GOD WILL LEAVE HIS WIFE TO GO FOR OUTSIDE SEX . SOME OF THESE FOUL STORIES ARE COOKED UP BY JNU COMMIE PROFESSORS<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_80BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_80b+seedBe5gD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_79B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/soil-liquefaction-during-earth-quakes.html?showComment=1539527673742#c3818086798541581105\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 14, 2018 at 8:04 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_79MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nI HAVE SEEN THE FAKE UDIPI MUTT RATH YATRA..<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE INTERVIEWED PAST PARTICIPANTS OF PARYAYA..<br />\n<br />\nMADHAVACHARYA IS A FAKE AND BACKDATED CREATION OF JEW ROTHSCHILD.. UDIPI SRI KRISHNA TEMPLE ( ATTACHED TO THE FAKE UDIPI MUTT ) WAS A AYYAPPA TEMPLE BEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/01/my-visit-to-sringeri-mutt-exhuming.html<br />\n<br />\nFAKE Madhwacharya gave sanyasa deeksha to 8 \u201cbala yatis\u201d\u200a\u2014\u200achild ascetics\u200a\u2014\u200aand made them in charge of the worship. Each yati was supposed to take turns and worship the murthy for two months. Thus, once every 16 months, the opportunity to worship would return.<br />\n<br />\nSATELLITE FAKE MUTT GALORE..<br />\n<br />\nThe names of the founders of the mathas and their matha name is as below<br />\n<br />\nSri Hrishikesha Tirtha\u200a\u2014\u200aPalimaru Matha<br />\nSri Narasimha Tirtha\u200a\u2014\u200aAdamaru Matha<br />\nSri Janardana Tirtha\u200a\u2014\u200aKrishnapura Matha<br />\nSri Upendra Tirtha\u200a\u2014\u200aPutthige Matha<br />\nSri Vamana Tirtha\u200a\u2014\u200aShirooru Matha<br />\nSri Vishnu Tirtha\u200a\u2014\u200aSode Matha<br />\nSri Rama Tirtha\u200a\u2014\u200aKaniyooru Matha<br />\nSri Adhokshaja Tirtha\u200a\u2014\u200aPejawara Matha<br />\n<br />\nThe transfer of responsibility, and indeed the whole duration of worship, came to be popularly known as \u201cparyaya\u201d. For e.g. if the yati of Pejawara Matha was handling the worship, it would be known as the \u201cPejawara paryaya\u201d and so on.<br />\n<br />\nOn the day of makara sankramana, a grand festival is arranged at Udupi. On the next day, the churnotsava (jaatre) is conducted. Two days later, the outgoing Swamiji conducts a brahma-rathothsava and offers special pujas to Krishna and arranges a grand feast for all devotees.<br />\n<br />\nALL THIS HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH SANATANA DHARMA.. NO POWER CAN BE GRABBED BY ANY MUTT HEAD..<br />\n<br />\nThe Swamijis of the FAKE UDUPI Dvaita tradition all wear silk on the paryaya day .<br />\n<br />\nThe culmination of the grand PARYAYA procession occurs with the Swamiji reaching the center of Udupi, specifically the ratha-beedi ( chariot) where the Udupi Sri Krishna temple exists.<br />\n<br />\nOn any given day, the paryaya Swamiji has to perform 14 different pujas to Krishna starting at brahmi muhurtha and ending late night. However, on the paryaya day, the outgoing Swamiji performs only the first of these pujas. The subsequent ones are to be performed by the incoming Swamiji.<br />\n<br />\nAn arathi is performed to Krishna and then to the Hanuman murthi just outside. Krishna has nothing to do with monkey Hanuman of Ramayana..<br />\n<br />\nThe final part of the paryaya ceremony is the glittering public ceremony at the nearby \u201craajangana\u201d. This is a public hall where the 8 Swamijis arrive together. Huge number of dignitaries\u200a\u2014\u200apolitical, social and religious\u200a\u2014\u200awould have gathered there by then.<br />\n<br />\nLater in the afternoon, nearly a lakh of devotees are fed a sumptous meal<br />\n<br />\nLET SIKHS STOP LANGAR IN GURUDWARAS -- LET THEM CHECK OUT HOW MANY DEVOTEES COME TO THE GURUDWARAS AFTER A YEAR..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_80b+seedBe5gD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_80b+seedBe5gD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VOqqm-hCbM/XCa06XjAUxI/AAAAAAABfL4/E3K2A6jHNG0XTf7_mZb9kjj9WxD3GwmzQCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. KNOW WHO YOU ARE ..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">THE DANAVA CIVILIZATION OF KERALA PRECEDED THE VEDIC CIVILIZATION BY SEVERAL MILLINIUMS..</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\nTHIS TRUE HISTORY HAS BEEN SUNK BY THE WHITE MAN WHO DID NOT WANT THE GLORY OF EGYPTIAN CIVILIZATION TO BE OWNED BY KERALA..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWE SEE THE FAMILIAR KATHAKALI DUO OF A MAN IN ELABORATE HEADGEAR AND A WOMAN IN A CAPE.. KERALA DOES NOT CELEBRATE DIWALI.. WE WERE AT THE RECEIVING END , THAT IS WHY..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/09/why-kerala-does-not-celebrate-diwali-or.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE MAYAN / AZTEC/ INCA CIVILIZATION IS DANAVA..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/maya-inca-aztec-civilizations-decoded.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE EGYPTIAN CIVILIZATION IS DANAVA..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">AYYAPPA WAS THE NINTH AVATAR OF VISHNU..<br /><br />HE DISAPPEARED FROM KERALA AS A SMALL CHILD AND RESURFACED IN EGYPT AS IMHOTEP, THE GOD FROM THE EAST , WHO WAS MORE POWERFUL THAN THE PHARAOH..&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/imhotep-patron-saint-of-freemasons-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA THERE WAS NOT A SINGLE BUDDHIST LEFT IN INDIA.. BUDDHISM DID NOT APPEAL TO INDIANS AS BUDDHA ATE PIG AND DID NOT BELIEVE IN THE SOUL..<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD REMOVED AYYAPPA AS THE NINTH AVATAR OF VISHNU AND INSERTED BUDDHA TO REVIVE BUDDHISM AND \u201cDIVIDE AND RULE \u201c..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nASHOKA WHO CONVERTED FROM BAAAAAD HINDUSIM TO GOOOOOD BUDDHISM NEVER EXISTED.. CHANAKYA WAS A KERALA NAMBOODIRI PROFESSOR.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html</span><br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD DELETED AYYAPPA TEMPLES IN KARNATAKA/ TAMIL NADU/ ANDHRA AND TELENGANA .. BUT HEY, THE HUMAN DNA MEMORY MADE SURE THAT TODAY MORE PEOPLE FROM THESE STATES COME FOR SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE THAN MALAYALIS..<br />\n<br />\nTHE FAKE UDIPI MUTT WAS AN AYYAPPA TEMPLE.. line-height: 150%;\">Till today I have NOT\nseen a single book or post on the internet , where they understood this supreme\nmethod of centering yourself , devised by Lord Shiva himself.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; You see some cockeyed idiots, right? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Same way &nbsp;Shambhavi Mudra is an act of concentrating on\nthe inner third eye of Shiva ( Ajna Chakra ). &nbsp;It does NOT mean that you have to try and look\nup at the centre of your forehead or the space between your eyebrows like a squint\neyed nincompoop. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; Any sensory input\nto your body and mind is an ahara. When you hear music it is ahara via your\nears. When you see a silent movie it is ahara via the eyes. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">The term pratyahara is\ncomposed of two Sanskrit words, prati and ahara. &nbsp;Indriya Pratyahara means literally\n\"control of ahara/ sensory inputs ,\" &nbsp;or in more erudite terms \"gaining mastery\nover external influences.\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">It is compared to a\nturtle withdrawing itself its shell \u2014 the turtle\u2019s shell is the mind and the\nsenses are the limbs. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Just as a healthy body\ncan resists toxins and pathogens, a healthy mind can ward off the negative\nsensory influences around it. &nbsp;&nbsp;If you are\neasily disturbed by the noise and turmoil of the environment around you, &nbsp;or jolted out of your mind by every small pothole of\nstress on the street of your life, practice &nbsp;pratyahara. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without it, you will not be able to meditate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; Karma-pratyahara\n\u2014 control of action, &nbsp;mano-pratyahara \u2014\nwithdrawal of mind from the senses. &nbsp;These\nare beyond the scope of this post.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Now select a silent,\nNOT so bright, cool place space, where there are NO strong smells &nbsp;. &nbsp;This\nis to prevent any input of sense of hearing/sense/ smell . &nbsp;&nbsp;If you can even feel the clock ticking-put &nbsp;ear plugs \u2013only if you are a beginner.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Keep the head, &nbsp;shoulder and spine upright and straight. &nbsp;And place the hands on the knees in (Jyana\nMudra).&nbsp; Upright is to keep the spirit\nlevel in the inner ear at equilibrium so that your brain lobes get balanced and\nsynchronized.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Simply be mindful of\nin-and-out diaphrgmic breathing where you stomach rises and falls. &nbsp;&nbsp;You may\nfeel that your breathing is too short, too long, too gentle or too heavy. &nbsp;Do not try to control it.&nbsp;&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: yellow;\">When you become distracted, gently refocus\nyour attention on your breathing. &nbsp;&nbsp;Restrict your attention to what is occurring\nin the immediate present moment. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: yellow;\">When you feel you have\nblocked out all ahara ( feed ) via your senses of smell, sight, hearing and\nfeeling , take a deep breath where you fill your lungs only 90 % and hold it . &nbsp;Put your tongue on your upper palate and\ntickle it for just 2 seconds and stop. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Now start exhaling VERY\nslowly while keeping the tip of your tongue stationary on the roof of your\nmouth.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;
